1.content:
Josh woke up, lying in the middle of a patch of grass, which was located somewhere in the center of Tom Brown Park. He felt like he was in a bit of a daze, as if he had been knocked out and had slept for hours.

Josh lifted his chest by pushing down on the ground with both arms extended. What had happened? Somehow, he was starting to get a splitting headache, as he slowly got back on his feet again. His entire body hurt, and his muscles felt extremely sore.

As he slowly stumbled his way to the main street, so that he could make his way home, he tried to remember what had just happened to him. He remembered leaving school, and then deciding to cut across the large inner city park, so that he could get home faster. Then, he vaguely remembered hearing a strange sound, which come from one of the bushes, just when he was walking by. But, what happened next? And how did he end up, face-down, in the grass?

For some reason, he felt happy when he saw his small, three-bedroom house. His parents were still at work, and both of his two older sisters were still taking classes at the community college. So, he knew that he had the house to himself for at least a couple of hours. He was glad; since he was hurting all over, he didn’t want anybody to see him anyway!

When he got home, he tossed his backpack on the bed and immediately walked into the bathroom. After he had taken a leak, he started to remove his t-shirt so that he could take a quick shower. It was the last week of school for him, and the Florida summer had started to take effect. It was 95 degrees outside, and it felt hot and muggy.

He looked over to the mirror, which hung from the bathroom wall, when he started to feel something odd throughout his entire body.

The tingling sensation was quite subtle at first, but it gradually increased. It began to feel like there was a low current, which was going through his body, just as if he was touching an electrical outlet or something.

The warm feeling gradually increased and became very intense, to the point where he started to feel a sharp pain going through his body, which began to affect every muscle!

Suddenly, his pectorals started to inflate like balloons, making his t-shirt feel very tight! His biceps began to bulge as well, while huge tiles of abdominals formed on his flat stomach!

“What the heck…?” he said to himself, as he watched his body inflate even more!

Slowly but surely, his entire upper body widened, and his shoulders grew bigger and more muscular. His deltoids and triceps became huge balls of muscle, which formed on his upper body. Then his quads and calves increased, not only growing bigger, but making his legs longer and a lot more muscular as well, to the point where the 5’4” foot teenager started to grow taller and taller in a matter of seconds.

After about thirty seconds of incredible growth, Josh couldn’t help but stare at his new body in complete disbelief! He was huge!

His head and his face still looked the same, but it seemed rather funny. His head just looked like it was detached from his old body, and placed on top of a new body, which had belonged to a bodybuilder!

His arms were incredible thick, while his legs were just bursting with power! He was about 7 feet tall, and he had become almost twice as wide as he was before he experienced this enormous growth spurt!

“Wow… This is intense!” he thought to himself, as he flexed before the mirror. A huge ball of muscle began to rise up from his upper arm, which was bigger than anything he had ever seen in his life! Not only did he look huge, but he was feeling great!

Josh noticed that he had to be a lot more careful. When he turned to open the bathroom door, he accidentally pulled the handle off the door! The handle snapped right off, even though he exerted very little force.

“Man… I’m strong… super strong!” he cheered, as he began to realize what had happened to him. He had transformed into a massive muscle teen!

So, now, what was he going to do next?

“Oh man, this is awesome!” Josh cheered, as he studied his overly muscled body in the large body-length mirror. “Look at these muscles!”

Josh was now the biggest teenage bodybuilder on earth, standing over 7 feet tall, and carrying almost 500 pounds in weight, mostly muscle. In fact, he had no fat on his body at all, and his muscles were bulging everywhere!

“I should go outside and show off my new physique…” he said, as he turned around and ran towards the front door.

Once he reached the door, he realized that he almost flattened the door know, due to his amazing strength.

“Oops… I had better be careful… I must be super strong right now!” he chuckled. Using his fingers, he clumsily reshaped the metallic doorknob, knowing that his dad would begin to wonder what had happened to it, if he didn’t fix it. Josh wasn’t quite ready yet to explain that he was experiencing random muscle growth spurts. And he definitely didn’t want to tell his mom, who would otherwise rush him to the Doctor’s office, out of her concern. She always worried about everything, and he wanted to have some fun first, before his parents found out.

Once he was outside, he walked over to the fire hydrant. Using his super strength, he was easily able to unscrew the cap, using just two fingers.

“Wow… With this strength, I can do just about anything!” he cheered, as he walked over to the driveway, where the old SUV was parked.

Then, he walked up to the rear bumper of the SUV, and placed his hands underneath the edge of the rear bumper. He slowly raised up his arms, lifting the rear tires of the SUV off the concrete floor, on their driveway.

“Wow! This is strength! Whoohooo!” he said, before he gently set the SUV back on the floor.

“I wonder if I’m going to stay like this, or grow bigger, or shrink back.” Josh wondered, as he turned around and wondered around the neighborhood. He decided to walk around a little more, and enjoy himself, until his muscles would shrink or grow again. But, he had no idea, when that was going to happen.

Suddenly, he felt that odd warm, tingling feeling again.

“Oh! I’d better get back to the house!” he thought, as he started to run home. Luckily, thanks to his muscular legs, running home was a breeze, with his powerful legs.

When he reached the house, he saw that he had left the large window of his bedroom wide open. His bedroom was on the second floor of the large house.

Using his overly-muscled legs, he made one mighty leap, and he jumped 15 feet through the second-floor window of his bedroom.

“Wow… Gotta love the strength and power!” he laughed. He was definitely the strongest human being on earth! It was a piece of cake, leaping 15 feet into the air!

The tingling feeling had intensified, so he jumped before the mirror, which was hanging from his closet door.

Suddenly, the tingling feeling had concentrated around his arms, both of them at the same time.

He gasped as he looked both sides, while he was overcome with an incredible urge to make fists with both hands, and to flex his arms.

While he was holding his flex, his existing biceps started to inflate. But that was not all: His arms started to grow slightly longer and wider! Then, as his arms widened, new lumps started to form on his arms, right next to where his original biceps were. He started to grow second biceps on each arm!

“Wowwwww!!!” Josh exclaimed, as he saw a BRAND NEW BICEP form next to the old one… on each arm!!!! He now had TWO biceps per arm!!

“Oh my God!” he shouted, as he flexed his arm, which now sported a left bicep, and a right one. “I have FOUR biceps????!!!!!??”

He was completely astonished, every time he flexed, as he saw TWO bowling-ball-sized biceps rise up as huge, rock-solid lumps on top of his arm. The feeling of DOUBLE the physical strength was incredible!

But the growth didn’t end there. Again, a hard lump started to form on his forearm, right between his elbow and his wrist, on each arm.

“Oh gosh! What’s happening to me??!!!” he wondered out loud. “All these NEW MUSCLES are beginning to pop up on my body!!!”

His forearms grew thicker and thicker as the lamps became harder and harder, slowly rising up from the top of his arm, as he held his hands in a fist with his fingers and wrist pointed up.

Brand new fore-arm-biceps developed on Josh’s arms, making them appear like the arms of a professional bodybuilder. Not only were they huge all over, but he had muscles, that no other person on earth could even dream of!

Josh was simply frozen before the mirror, as he took turns flexing each arm, while he was admiring his reflection in the mirror. He now sported THREE biceps on each arm!!!

Suddenly, the old telephone in the hall started to ring. Out of habit, Josh ran to grab the phone, and lifted the horn as he held against to his ear.

“Hello?”

“Hey, Josh! This is Matt! What are you doing this afterno-…”

Suddenly, the telephone went dead.

“Hello? Matt? Hello?”

Josh then pulled back his arm and gasped when he realized that he had crushed the phone receiver with his mighty fingers!!

“Oh man… I’m so strong… I crushed the phone!” he uttered, as he stared at the metal and plastic receiver, which was smashed at the handle.

“I guess I don’t know my own strength…”

He put the phone down and decided to run to Matt’s house. That was easy, since Matt lived a few blocks away. First, he decided to put on an extra baggy sweatshirt, so he could hide his muscles when he ran across the street.

“I can’t wait to show Matt my new muscles…” he chuckled, as he leaped out the window, landing in the lawn on his super-powered legs. “Off we go!”

Josh was so strong, that he could leap over 50 feet through the air, traveling through the neighborhood by leaping from one rooftop to the next.

When he finally landed on the roof of Matt’s house, something dawned on him.

“Oh darn…” If I use certain muscles a lot, they’ll start to grow even MORE!”

He had used his calves and his quads a lot, and he wondered how that would affect his weird growth spurts… Or, would he grow new muscles on his legs, too?

Suddenly, he was overcome with that tingling feeling. This time, it was in both legs. Josh gasped as he looked down, and stared at his quads and his calves…

What was going to happen?

“I don’t know if I have clothes that will fit you, but I’ll see if I can find something.” said Matt “So you don’t know why you are so big all of the sudden? Do you think you’ll grow bigger?”

“I’m sure I’ll get bigger or smaller. I just don’t know when” said Josh “Can we go and look for the clothes now?”

After emptying several drawers Matt finally found an XL sized shirt and shorts his grandma once gave him as a gift, and he has never used because it was just too big.

“I think this will fit” said Matt as he handed Josh the shirt. Josh tried to put it on, but even though it was an XL his arms and pecs were almost ripping the shirt, even his abs were visible trough his shirt. His shorts were almost ripping ever since Josh’s legs were so huge.

“Well, it’s better than nothing.” Said Josh trying not to flex or move a lot or he would rip his friend’s clothes”

Matt went towards his friend and touched his arm. Matt was surprised by the hardness of the muscle. A huge vein topped the inhumanly sized bicep. Josh was smiling as he saw how eager his friend to feel Josh’s muscles was.

“How does it feel being so big?” asked Matt

“It feels great being so big and strong. I mean I could even lift a SUV earlier this day” Josh looked how Matt’s eyes widened as he was surprised by what his friend was telling him” It’s a little scary tough. I don’t even know how strong I am.”

“Don’t worry Josh. No matter how big you get, I’ll always be here for you.”

“Thank you Matt…” said Josh “uggh… it’s that feeling again”

“Does that means you’ll grow again?”

“Grow, shrik… I dunno”

11212211.content:
“Oh, man… You’d better get away from your desk!” Matt shouted, as Josh started to groan.

“Uhhh… Oh man… I feel it… It’s coming….” Josh groaned, as he felt the tingling feeling in his muscles intensify, meaning his muscles were going to inflate again.

“Here! Get away from that desk!” Matt shouted, as he grabbed Josh by the hand an pulled him up and off the chair, and not a moment too soon!

As soon as Josh got up from the chair behind his desk, his pectorals started to push outward and sideways, like balloons which were being pumped up with air.

“Ooooohhhwhhaaaa!!!” Josh shouted, as he felt his muscles expand.

At the same time, his arms thickened and his biceps grew to practically twice the size, until they were the size of soccer balls. Josh’s thighs widened and thickened at the same time, with thick, long veins coming to the surface, forcing him to adjust his stance. He had to spread apart his legs, because they had become too wide!

“Uuuuuhhh!!!!!” Josh moaned, as Matt looked on.

“Whoa! This is a big one!” Matt grinned, as he saw his friend become absolutely huge!

Finally, Josh’s calves inflated to the size of bowling balls! When the amazing growth spurt stopped, it left a teenage bow standing in the room, with humongous muscles!

“Oh my… Oh my, oh my, oh my…” Josh gasped, as he looked down at his body. He struggled to see his feet, because his large pectorals were blocking the view, so he had to bend down in order to see them. “Uhh… I feel so heavy….”

“Wow… You look incredible!” Matt smiled, as he walked closer to Josh and reached out, running his finger over Josh’s enormous pectorals. Clearly, Josh had already burst out of his shirt, and luckily he wasn’t wearing anything but his Spandex. “And you got these long veins, all over your body!”

“Oh my… You’re right…” Josh said, as he turned and made a fist with his right hand, and admired his huge, bulging bicep, which surfaced on the upper surface of his arm like a huge, bulging ball of muscle. Long veins surfaced all over the big, solid sphere of muscle.

“Let’s go outside…. Who knows, you might grow even bigger!” Matt suggested.

Matt and Josh then walked out the door. They looked funny: A skinny kid next to a hulking muscle boy. What would happen next?

1122.content:
“Oh no!” Josh gasped out loud. “I’m getting too big to fit through the door!”

Josh was now over 10 feet tall, and he had over 300 pounds of muscle on his body. His shoulders were 5 feet wide and his legs were 3 feet wide each!

Josh tried to open the door with only two fingers, realizing the possibility of bending or breaking steel with all his strength. When the door was finally open, he realized that his body had become too wide to fit through the door!

“I’m too big… I need to shrink back a little…” he thought. “Maybe if I just lay down and relax, I’ll shrink back eventually…”

Josh stood in the middle of the back yard and he lay down on the lawn. Then, with his chest facing up, he closed his eyes and tried to relax.

After a few moments, his muscles began to shrink back so that he now looked like the original Josh again! His arms deflated and became thin, as well as his huge legs. His abdominals disappeared and left behind a thin, flat stomach. His huge pectorals deflated and shrunk back to a thin, flat chest. His shoulders shrunk back to normal, and he was now restored to his old body again.

Just at that moment, his mother opened the back door.

“Josh! What are you doing laying on the grass?” she wondered. “Are you alright?”

“I’m fine, mom…” Josh replied, as he slowly stood up and brushed the grass from his shoulders. “I was just trying to get a sun tan…”

“Oh ok… Well, please deliver this letter to Mister Jones’ house, on the other street, will you?” his mom asked him.

Mister Jones did the landscaping at Josh’s house, and his mom wanted to pay the monthly bill.

“Sure, mom…” he said, as he took the envelope from his mother. Wearing only his spandex and sandals, Josh walked out the back door and headed towards the house, which was one block away.

What would happen during his walk around the neighborhood?

Next was his torso, his already defined rock hard abs and pecs bulged outwards even more as veins started covering them. Finally, his biceps inflated like crazy and doubled in size.

"Great, I'm huge!", Josh said. "Time to try again my new strength, but were can I find something big enough to lift?"

Upon arrival, everyone stared at Josh, the girls and lust and the guys in envy. No one had ever seen someone so huge! Josh tried to ignore everyone's stares and slowly dipped his body into the heated pool.

Josh started off with a few easy laps, but he wasn't even tired yet. He started to go for harder and longer, and soon he was swimming at amazing speed up and down the pool. However, as Josh finally climbed out of the pool, he noticed that he wasn't even tired! Josh wondered what he would do next.

114.content:
As Josh walked around the block, he finally sat down on the sidewalk. Since he relaxed for a few minutes, without using any muscles at all, his muscles suddenly started to shrink back to normal.

"Hey... I'm normal again!" Josh noted, after his muscles slowly started to shrink back. "If I don't use my muscles, or relax for a few minutes, I guess they shrink back. That's a good thing to know!"

After a few minutes, Josh stood up and walked back to his house.

Meanwhile, Jake, one of the boys from across the street, was watching Josh with his binoculars.

"Wow.... One minute, Josh is big and muscular... And then he's back to normal again? What's going on here?"

Jake was determined to find out more about Josh's strange muscular growth spurts. He had a few friends who helped him, since they were all members of the Hill Street Gang.

Jake grabbed his cell phone and called Troy, one of his neighbors.

"Troy... Meet me at my house with your cell phone. We're gonna make a video of Josh. Yeah... He grows and becomes really muscular... We're gonna post it on YouTube... Awesome!"

Then he hung up.

"This is gonna be the hottest video on the web.... A skinny guy grows into a muscle man... Thanks, Josh!"

1142.content:
Troy and Jake started following Josh from a good distance as Josh walked over to Matt’s house. As soon as Matt opened the door and let Josh in, the two boys ran over to just below where the window was to Matt’s bedroom.

“Troy! Josh is always hanging out with Matt!” Jake said to him. “Maybe we can find out from Matt, what the things are that will make Josh grow huge?”

The boys gently placed their ears against the window, as they tried to listen in on the conversation.

Inside, Josh was pacing around Matt’s room

“Dude! I’m starving! Goat anything to eat around here?” he asked.

“Here, man… Have an apple or a banana!” Matt said. “That’s all I got…”

“Your mom is just as bad into healthy food as mine…” Josh sighed. “Give me the banana…”

Josh took the banana and started removing the peels as Matt started to speak to him.

“Josh! You should be able to participate in some of the sports teams! Or, even in a bodybuilding contest!” Matt suggested. “You just need to eat a LOT of food…”

Josh finished the banana and tossed the peel in the trash.

“Yeah…” he chuckled. “Lots of meat, fruit, or veggies. All those things make my muscles grow huge!”

After he ate the banana Josh could already feel that particular tingling on his body. He was about to grow.

“Arrrgh!” he said “Here it comes again”

Suddenly his muscles started expanding, as if they were being inflated with a pump. With every passing second his muscles started to grow bigger and bigger, pushing against the fabric of his clothes. Slowly his body started to grow taller to accommodate his mass. Finally after some minutes he stopped. He was 6’1’’ now, and his clothes were stretched to the limit.

“Dude, did you see that?” said Troy. “Wow!!! He grew so much after eating just ONE banana!”

“Yeah, Imagine what would happen if we gave him lot’s of food.” Jake said with a wide grin. “Do you think the same I do?”

“His muscles will blow up!” Troy said.

“Next time Josh blows up, we want to record it and put it on our website!” Jake said. “Everybody will want to watch that!”

“So we need to gather a lot of food, and get Josh to eat it so his muscles will blow up?”

“Yeah… Let’s get our camera!” Jake said. “And some fruit and veggies!”

The two boys ran back to their house and started working on their plan…

Josh had finally made it to the locker room, when he felt that tingling sensation again! This time, however, it didn't feel as intense as the previous growth spurt. That meant that only certain muscles would grow and not all of them. What would happen next?

He looked over and admired all the guys, who were working out. Some were huge, others were smaller and others just looked really athletic.

What was Josh going to try first? And what would the results be?
1152112.title: Walking around in the Gym

choices: Leg Growth- Phase 2
The rest of his starts to grow as well!
11521121.content:
Josh got on the leg press machine and set the weight to just thirty pounds. He figured that wasn’t very much. Then he placed both feet against the metal plate, and he started pushing the plate away, extending his legs all the way, before allowing his legs to retract again.

“Alright… Let’s do a dozen reps…” he said to himself. “One… Two… Three… Four… Five… Six… Seven… Eight… Nine… Ten… Eleven… And twelve!”

Then he got on the machine to do calf raises, where he had to stand on a bar with his toes while holding to dumbbells with his hands. He did a dozen reps with those as well.

“Alright… Let’s do a dozen reps of this…” he said to himself once more. “One… Two… Three… Four… Five… Six… Seven… Eight… Nine… Ten… Eleven… And twelve!”

He set the dumbbells on the floor and started to walk around. Luckily he was wearing his super-stretchy shorts at that time.

He was about to walk to the water fountain when he felt that familiar tingling feeling.

“Uh oh…” he sighed. “I think some part of me is gonna grow again….”

Indeed! Suddenly, his legs began to expand rapidly! He knew this was going to happen! Josh quickly looked up and breathed a sigh of relief when he saw that the gym he was in had very high, 40-foot ceilings.

Josh’s calves became hard as rocks! His quads became very stiff, as his muscles suddenly came to life and started expanding on their own! Slowly but surely it appeared as if they began to expand sideways, making his legs wider and wider!

“Uhh…. Uuuuuuhhhhhhh!!!!” Josh groaned, as he was feeling intense pain in his legs while his muscles continued to expand on their own. But something else was going on. His skeletal structure was also changing! His bones were growing thicker and longer at the same time as well. His growth plate was producing more bone, and his bones were growing rapidly longer and thicker at the same time! His legs were growing longer while his muscles were expanding, all at once!

People started noticing as they looked on. Josh was standing there, slowly growing taller and taller as his legs began pushing his torso and upper body skyward!

“Aaaahhhhhh!” Josh groaned for a few moments, until it stopped. Josh had suddenly gained almost a foot in height, all because his legs had grown a foot longer than before! Not only that, but his quads were much bigger, and his calves had doubled in width!

“Wow! Look at that kid’s legs!” one guy said.

“Did he just grow before my very eyes?” another lady wondered.

Josh had just shot up from 5 foot 4 inches tall to 6 foot 4 inches in height in just 30 seconds time.

People gathered around the now tall teen, who had massive legs.

“I-I guess I had a growth spurt…” Josh said shyly. What else could he say?
11521121.title: A Leg Workout leads to Leg Growth!

115212.content:
As Josh lay on top of his expanding pectorals, he begins to wonder when the growth would stop.

“Oooh man… I’m getting bigger and bigger!” he gasps, as his pecs grow into the size of giant beach balls, which were filled with solid muscle.

The increasing pectorals also added to the weight in his chest, forcing him to fall forward and to lie on top of his ballooning pecs. What’s more, the pectorals kept on growing, causing Josh’s legs to slowly rise up from the floor, due to the tremendous weight and size of his ever-growing pectorals.

Since the pectorals just kept on growing, they became wider and taller, lifting Josh’s entire body further from the ground. But the giant pecs continued to fill the locker room, as they grew sideways as well.

“This is freakish!” he exclaimed, as his pecs grow wider, thicker, harder and taller. The expanding muscle grows so huge, that it fills the locker room floor, and it grows until it reaches the side of the wall, where the door is located. His giant pecs had blocked the door, so nobody could enter the room!

Josh just giggled as he reached out with both hands, and rubbed his hands over the side of his oversized muscles.

“Wow… This is my own skin… My body…” he noted, as he could feel his hands while he rubbed his skin. He could actually “feel” his pecs as they pressed against the locker room wall and door. His pecs had now filled the entire front section of the locker room. His pecs were also about 5 feet thick, so that the rest of his body was just resting on top of his giant pectorals.

“Okay… If I just hold still and try not to use my muscles, they should shrink back to normal soon…” Josh reasoned. So far, his muscles have always shrunk back, eventually. He also knew that some other muscle might start to grow, when his pecs would shrink back.

Then, suddenly, he felt that familiar, tingling feeling…

“Oh! Here it comes…” he cheered.

Soon, he would be freed from this predicament… But what muscle would grow, next?

Josh is relieved when his pecs finally shrink back to normal.

"If I just relax my muscles for a minute, they'll shrink back to normal" he reasoned. And it was true, after a few minutes of laying still on the ground, they dwindled back to their normal size again.

Josh got up and left the locker room, heading out to the weight room. Then he decided to go outside and walk to the park.

"I'm going for a run in the park..." he thought to himself.

He walked to the park and started jogging down the trail.

After three minutes of light jogging, he had to stop, because the intense tingling feeling had started again, and this time, it was in both of his legs!

"Uh oh..." he thought, as he stopped and stood on the side of the trail. "I feel it..."

Suddenly, his legs began to GROW! They grew bigger and longer! His quads thickened and widened at the same time, doubling in size! His calves ballooned to twice the size as well! His knees increased as well!

"Whoa... WHOA!!!" Josh yelled, as he swung his arms to maintain balance, while his upper body shot straight up, due to his growing legs. he immediately began to grow taller, while his legs doubled in size. Within a few seconds, Josh was standing 8 feet tall, with 5-foot long legs, which were super-muscled and twice as big as before!

"My legs... They're HUGE!"

Josh looked funny... He had his normal upper body attached to his giant legs.

"Now I gotta wait for my legs to shrink back to normal..."

In the meantime, he enjoyed the view of the park, now that he was standing over 8 feet tall...
1152121.title: Jogging makes his legs grow

...A total stanger.
11521212.content:
The sensation of having such huge legs felt rather odd, yet exhilarating to Josh. While he just stood there, his legs merely felt heavy. But when he tried to lift a foot up, he felt like one of those clowns at the circus on those high stilts. Though these were his legs and though they were rippling to the brim with muscle, he almost felt out of control of them. "Maybe I just need a little practice," he muttered to himself.

Putting his hands straight out from side to side, he gave what little balance he could as he picked up his right foot. As it hung in the air, he could feel all the power behind his enormous leg. It was five feet tall all on its own, with the muscle of any well endowed bodybuilder. No wonder it felt so strong. But as he placed his foot back down out in front of him, it came down with a loud rumble. He could see various things on the ground shake many feet below him even after he had stopped moving his foot. "Ok, more danty then."

Picking his next foot up, he tried to place it more gently on the ground. This time, it was better. The thud of his huge foot hitting the ground wasn't nearly as loud. However, now he was having problems with his leg going too high in the air. Each time he lifted a thick, rippling thigh in the air, he would momentarily block his view of the earth below.

"You know, I think I am getting the hang of this," Josh announced to himself, quite pleased of how he was taming his two large beasts.

Josh was only a few feet away from the park gates when the unspeakable happened. Though he had stopped moving just outside the gate that stared him in the face, he could feel a rumble in both of his legs. Josh had suspected that trying to move would make this happen, but he very well could not have stayed just standing in one spot indefinably now could he?

"Oh great," he exclaimed, "How much bigger can they really get? I mean, look at my tiny torso. I'm going to look like a freak."

As Josh pondered the possibilities of what was about to happen to him, it really was happening. Josh could feel every muscle and bone in his two behemoths growing once again. He quickly shot up past the arc of the gate to the park and was climbing higher in the air. In mere seconds, he could feel his tightening quads rubbing up against the fragile steel of the gate. Josh didn't have to look at the destruction below to know that his legs had outmatch the metal of the gate. As his legs continued to expand even larger and thicker than they had been, they left the rubble of the entrance at his expanding feet.

Josh couldn't see the ground around him any longer. His thighs had thickened to the point to where there was a huge blind spot just below him. It was large enough for a child to hide in and in moments, maybe even an adult.

He could feel his calves flexing larger with his thighs. His feet furiously attempted to keep up with both of those. Josh could only watch as he was propelled higher and higher in the air, the rippling feeling of growing muscles expanding from his hips keeping him company. In fact, his legs had grown to such a point that Josh wasn't even sure if he could walk. He knew that he had at least doubled in height and was pretty sure his legs had done at least that in width.

"Once, I had struggled to be noticed," Josh said in bemusement of himself, feeling the growth subside, "But I don't think that THIS was what I had in mind."

Though this may have not been what he had in mind, it had happened. It was really happening. Josh's flimsy, baby like torso had been propelled ten more feet in the air, leaving his head innocently looming over...
11521212.title: Growing at the Gates

115212121.content:
As Josh started to walk out the park with his giant legs, he suddenly heard his named being called out by a voice which came from below.

“Somebody’s shouting my name!” he said, as he looked down. “It sounds like Matt!”

“Matt! MATT!” he shouted, as he tried to bend down, using his giant legs.

“Get on the ground!” Matt shouted. “You’re too tall for me!”

“Let me sit down on the grass… Maybe I can just let my legs lay in front of me…” Josh said, as he bent down on one leg, as he extended his left leg in front of him while he sat down on his right leg. As soon as he sat down, he extended his right leg as well. Now that he was sitting down, he was still elevated from the ground, because his thighs were so thick and wide.

Matt came running towards Josh, and he was happy to see him!

“There you are!” Josh said, as he looked down at Matt.

“Well, at least we can talk!” Matt complained. “I can’t talk to you when you’re over 30 feet tall!”

“Oh yeah… My legs are kind of big right now…” Josh sighed. “Maybe, if I sit here for a few minutes, then they’ll shrink back to normal size again!”

“Oh, that’s a shame!” Matt observed. “I bet the view must be wonderful from thirty feet up in the sky!”

“Would you like to go for a ride?” Josh offered.

“What do you mean?” Matt replied curiously.

“Well, why don’t you climb on my shoulders and sit on them? I can try to stand on my super-legs, and I’ll go for a walk. You can then enjoy the view from sitting on my shoulders!” Josh said cheerfully.

“Josh… You’re the best! You’re so generous…” Matt grinned, as he walked over to Josh’s backside and started to climb up his shoulders.

Matt swung his legs over Josh’s shoulders so that his legs were on either side of Josh’s neck.

“Alright, you big horse! Giddyap!” Matt cheered.

“Hold on tight, Matt! I’m going to stand up!” Josh warned him.

"The boy is our home on earth, so we must make him powerful!" one voice said.

"I think we need to make him ruler over earth!" another one replied.

"There is no limit to his growth! I suggest we make him the biggest human being alive!" a third alien recommended.

"Nothing and nobody is allowed to hurt him" the alien leader added. "We must protect him at all costs! If the boy dies, then we'll all die!"

Josh heard a murmer coming from within.

"The boy must become the most powerful human being on earth" one shouted.

"Yes! He must grow!" another piped up.

"Make him grow! Make him grow!!" several shouted in choir.

"Huh?" Josh wondered out loud. What was going on inside of him?

"I-I'm getting scared...." Josh panicked, as he was about to run home, not realizing that the voices were coming from inside of him.

Then, every muscle was overcome by a very powerful tingling sensation!

"OOOOhhhwhhaaa!!!" Josh shouted, as his feet locked into place.

"RULE THE WORLD, BOY!" several voices shouted. "YOU ARE THE MASTER OF THE EARTH!!"

"What?" Josh gasped, as his legs began to expand rapidly.

His feet grew five sizes bigger, as his legs began to grow thicker and longer! His calves burst out from the back of his legs, tearing the socks to pieces! His feet tore the sneakers he was wearing, and his quads rapidly grew longer and wider! Josh suddenly grew over 2 feet taller, shooting up in height as well as in weight and muscle mass!

"OOOOOOhhhhh!!!!!" Josh gasped, as his shoulders grew three times wider than before! His arms became massive pythons of muscle, with canon-ball biceps filling up his arms while they grew thicker and wider. His abs became huge bricks of muscle, and his pecs ballooned to inhuman sized beachballs of power and might!

Josh ripped out of all his clothes and finally looked down, standing almost 9 feet tall and hulking over every single person who was walking out on the street.

"AAAAIIIEEEEE!!!!" people screamed as they ran away from the giant boy in fear!

Josh looked down and realized that he was now the biggest and strongest human being on the planet!!

Then, he saw an old abandoned house by the side of the road. He took a deep breath and inhaled, before blowing at the house. Instantly, the whole house caved in and transformed into a pile of rubble! Josh blew it down with one mighty breath!

"Wow! I am so STRONG now..." the boy whispered to himself.

The ground shook with every step he took, since had had over 600 pounds of muscle on his body. Not only that, but he was still growing bigger and stronger, as well!

Now Josh realized that he really could rule the world with his might!

Josh then stood on his toes, flexing his calf muscles in the process, so that he was now tall enough to see who was outside.

“KKKKKRRRRRRRRRRRR” was the sound of his calves, as they continued to inflate. After a few seconds, Josh was left standing in his room, with the most powerful legs on earth! Plus, he had two calves on each leg!

“Oh my God…” he gasped, when the tingling had stopped. He looked down and stared at his enormous legs. Truly, the level of strength and power, which was now coursing through his legs, was completely inhuman.

When Josh slowly made one step over towards the window, his double-calves caused him to leap out the window like a small piece of paper that had been shot from a rubber sling. His mighty calves had suddenly given the greatest vertical leap, of any human being on earth!

“Oooh…. WHOAOAOA!!” he shouted, as he soared from the bedroom window, heading towards the lawn down below.

Luckily, he remembered to keep his legs pointing towards the ground, so that he would land on his feet.

When he finally came down, his nuclear calves immediately shot him back up again, as a catapult. He had this amazing spring in his legs!

“Oh my goodness… I’m leaping into the air at 30 feet, for every step I’m trying to walk… I can’t even walk normally anymore! I can only JUMP!” he realized, as he looked down while his body was ascending.

Luckily, he was able to steer where he was going, whenever he came down on his legs. With every bounce, he started to leap less hard, as he forced his legs to relax. Finally, he just bounced straight up and down, as he landed on the street, before he came to a complete standstill.

“Wow! I feel like there’s a rocket attached to my legs!” he grinned, as he stared at his double calves.

What was he going to do now?
12211.title: Rocket Booster Legs

choices: Another growth spurt
Another set of brand new muscles!!!!!
122111.content:
Rather than to relax a little bit, so that his calves could shrink back after awhile, Josh decided to put his new set of twin calves to use and to immediately have some fun while he had them.

He tried to walk one step forward, but his double calves immediately send him soaring 10 feet into the air, before coming right back down again, in the middle of the street.

BOING

As soon as his feet touched the pavement, his double calves immediately hurled him back through the air again! He would leap through the air, as he exerted the slightest effort. He soared 13 feet through the air, before coming down a few feet away. He was jumping about as high as the rooftops of some of the single-level homes. This gave him the idea to try to land on the roof of a house.

BOIIING!!!

As he bounced up again, he flew towards the roof of a small house. His feet touched down on the roof, but his double-calves sent him leaping through the air again!

BOOOIIIIINNGGGG!

He was leaping higher and higher, as he bounced from one rooftop to the next. Finally, he came to the last house on the street, and he planted his feet in such a way, that he would bounce back onto the street. The only thing, he didn’t think about, was the fact that he was landing harder and harder from greater distances, and therefore, using his new calves more than he had considered.

BOOOIIIIIIIIIINNNNNGGGGG!!!!!

He came down with a great speed, and his legs made him bounce forward again! This time, he was soaring over 30 feet above the ground!!

“Darn… I’d better slow down, before I end up bouncing onto the next county!” he chuckled.

Josh then decided to relax his legs, which meant that he would no longer bounce so hard, which would cause him to slow down, and eventually come to a stopping point.

After a few bounces, he remained almost at one spot, and he bounced less and less, until he was able to stand on the street, with both feet on the floor. He was completely drenched in sweat, from jumping around the neighborhood.

“Man… These calves are giving me an incredible vertical leap! This is awesome!!!!” he cheered.

Suddenly, it dawned on him, that he was using muscles, which had already grown huge. Now that he had two calves on each leg, he began to ponder if he was going to have another growth spurt in his legs?

He just stood still, in the middle of the street, until that odd, tingling sensation hit him in the legs again.

“Uh oh… Here we go again!”

Josh looked down and stared at his mighty legs, wondering what was going to happen to them now.
122111.title: Leg Boy

choices: Josh grows again
Josh carries Matt on his back as he leaps around
1221112.content:
The tingling in his legs intensified, and Josh began to understand how his muscles were reacting. Whenever he would grow huge muscles and he ended up using them a lot, they would eventually end up growing even BIGGER and he ends up being a hulk even LONGER every time!

“Oooh boy… I feel another growth spurt coming! Oh no! It’s in my legs again! “I feel the…. Whoaoaoaaa!!!”

Suddenly, the intense tingling struck his legs. This time, his old calves and his new ones began to tingle. It was as if his body was trying to make room on his legs, for new muscles again! But, his legs were already so big and wide, so the growth suddenly appeared to be shifting to the part of his legs, just below his double-calves, and above the ankle.

Then, almost as expected, two new lumps of flesh and muscles started forming immediately below his two, existing calves, His legs were now growing brand new muscles, and Josh only gasped and looked down in amazement as his mighty legs began to grow even more powerful!

The lumps formed and increased in size and width, as if they were almost competing for leg space.

KKKKRRRRRRRRRR was the sound again, as Josh felt his body structure change. The bones in his legs grew thicker and wider, and his legs just below the knees began to grow wider, as large, new muscles formed and began to grow their way into full glory.

“Oh my God… I’m growing ANOTHER set of calves! I will end up with FOUR calves on each leg!!??”

Indeed, after a few moments had passed, Josh’s legs had grown upper calves and lower calves, on both legs! He was completely amazed, as he stared down. His legs were all muscle now, and it almost seemed like they had maxed out! His legs were nothing but long pillars of muscle, and he knew it.

As Josh hopped on the rooftop of Matt’s house, he could feel the incredible increase of strength that was soaring through his legs. His long, overgrown legs were just like rocket boosters, which were attached to his body.

With amazing ease, Josh vaulted from the rooftop, and landed in the lawn, just in front of the house. Luckily, Matt was home. Matt had spotted something falling from the roof of his house, so he walked over to the bedroom window and opened it.

“Josh?” he shouted.

“Hey, Matt! Open the window! I’m coming!” Josh said to him. “I’m gonna jump through your window! Move aside!”

“What? That’s impossible! How can you…”

“Just do it!” Josh ordered.

Matt opened both windows wide open, and then he got out of the way.

Josh then leaped from the lawn below, and vaulted into the second floor bedroom window, landing with both feet on the bedroom floor.

“Wow… How did you do that? Look at you!” Matt gasped as he looked at his best friend from school, who was looking like a young, teenage bodybuilder.

“It’s a long story, dude… But it’s been great!” Josh explained with a grin on his face. “I got zapped by an alien, and he left me with something strange… I have to go through random growth spurts for the rest of my life!”

“Holy cow! You mean, you’re going to be this way for the rest of your life?”

Josh just stared at him with a wide grin on his face. He then decided to have some fun, and made a fist before flexing his right arm.

“Look at these guns, dude… I’m loaded with super strength!” he beamed, as two sets of biceps rose up from his arms. They were like two bowling balls, which were fused side-by-side on his mighty arms.

“Dude… You look like some kind of a super hero!” Matt gasped as he examined his best friend from head to toe. “You look fantastic!”

“Dude! It’s an awesome feeling… Like I can do anything! I’m serious!”

So what are Josh and Matt going to do next?
1221112.title: Quadruple Calves

choices: Josh becomes a super hero
Josh becomes a professional athlete
12211122.content:
“Hey, dude, want to go for a ride to the park?” Josh had asked Matt. Matt was always a little taller than Josh, but, now that Josh was a lot more muscular, he had enough strength to carry him on his back.

“Sure… Maybe we can go to the park or something?” Matt asked him.

Matt climbed on Josh’s back. He was wearing his shirt and jeans, while Josh was only wearing his spandex shorts and the sandals on his feet. In fact, Josh had just decided to remove the spandex, since he would be walking on the grass in the park anyway.

Then, like a true super hero, Josh leaped from the second floor bedroom window, with Matt sitting on his shoulders while holding on to his forehead using his hands.

“Weeeeeee!!” Matt cheered, as Josh leaped to the lawn below him. Once Josh’s legs had touched the grassy lawn, his four mighty calves then launched him back into the air, allowing the super muscle boy to soar over 50 feet through the sky, soaring over the street and then landing in the park.

“”Let’s go to the picnic area, okay?” Josh said.

As soon as they landed near the playground, they started to walk towards the duck pond, when they heard the loud cries of a lady. The lady was sitting at a park bench, facing the pond, when a tall, skinny young man had walked past her and reached out, snatching her handbag from her before he started to run off with it.

“Thief! You thief!” the lady began to shout, as the man dashed off with the handbag in his hands. “Come back here! Thief!!!!”

“Oh no!” Matt wondered as he looked up. “She just got robbed!”

Matt then turned to face his best friend. “Do something!”

Josh immediately leaped into the air, landing at the other side of the pond, and a few yards in front of the man, who was running away with the handbag.

“Stop! Give the handbag back to her!” Josh ordered the man, who was running straight towards him. The man saw this strange, super-muscular teenager standing before him, so he darted the other way, as he was trying to avoid Josh.

But, Josh was faster, thanks to his hyper-muscular legs, and he darted right in front of him again!

“Hand it over! You thief!” Josh said, as he stood right in front of him once again.

The thief started running the other way, when Josh quickly leaped besides him for the third time, and this time Josh reached out with his hand and grabbed the thief by his jacket.

“Let go of me, you freak!” the man shouted, as he tried to wrestle free from Josh’s mighty grip. “Let go of me!”

Josh just reached down and pulled the hand bag from the thief’s hands, setting it on the floor behind him.

“Do you still want the bag? Then, come and get it!” Josh taunted him.

“Why you little brat… I’m gonna punch your lights out right now!” the man threatened, as he ran towards Josh, with both of his fists placed before his chest.

Josh just stood there in silence, right in front of the handbag, guarding it with his muscular body.

The man swung his right fist, punching Josh in his abdomens!

THUD!!

“Yeeeeeoauauawww!!” the man screamed, as he held on to his right hand with his left hand.

He was screaming in pain, since he felt like punching a brick wall!

“My turn!” Josh chuckled, as he clearly enjoyed his super strength. Josh then placed his hands on the man’s chest, giving him a light shove. This shove resulted in the man being hurled almost ten feet through the air, before he landed on a patch of grass behind him, knocking him out.

“Here you go, ma’am… Here’s your handbag!” Josh said, as he politely handed the handbag back to the lady.

“Thank you so much, young man… That was mighty brave of you to stop the robber like that! I’m extremely grateful!”

“My pleasure, ma’am! I have to go now. Bye!” Josh chuckled, before he leaped back over the pond to where matt was standing. The two boys then watched, as the security truck drove by, with flashing lights on top.

The security guard then got out of the truck, and placed handcuffs on the dazed man, who felt like he had been struck by a tornado!

“Everything alright, ma’am?” the guard asked the lady, who now had her handbag back.

“Yes, thanks to that fine young man, who took the handbag away from the thief! He stopped him, and it almost resulted in a fist fight. But, the thief was no match for the young man, and he just pushed him to the floor!” the lady explained to the security guard.

“Another young man? Who?”

“I don’t know! He came from the sky like an angel! He was short and he had a big chest! He was all full of muscle and he was very strong!” the lady said, as she tried to describe what Josh looked like.

Josh and Matt were watching from the distance as the security guard took the thief and placed him in the back seat of his truck, driving him off to the police station.

“Good job there, super hero!” Matt chuckled. “That was your first official heroic deed!”

“Yeah...” Josh sighed, as he looked down at his incredibly muscular body. “I have to thank the alien for this! This is just amazing!”

“So when are you going to shrink back?”

“I’m not sure… I noticed that my muscles shrink back if I don’t use them for awhile… We’ll see…”

The boys then walked around the park, wondering what would happen next.
12211122.title: Josh's first act as a super hero

choices: Josh goes to help the masses
Josh discovers that matt was wrong, and found out what really made him grow.
122111221.content:
Josh and Matt continue to walk around the park, when Matt notices something.

"Josh..." Matt starts. "You grew again."

"Huh?" Josh asks.

"You're almost as tall as me." Matt points out. "And your muscles are bigger."

Josh looks down at himself. "You're right. my pants are tighter too...I didn't even notice when I grew."

"It had to have happened after you got that women's purse." Matt says. "Because before that, you were shorter."

"Yeah...mabye I'm just slowly growing?"

"Mabye, that would be..." Matt stops, and focuses off into the distance. "What's going on there?"

Josh looks, and they both realize what's happening. Off in the distance, 2 men were dragging a women into an ally, beating her brutaly. She flailed, and one of the men slammed her in the back of the head, just as she shouted, knocking her out. The men pulled her into the dark ally, slowly removing her clothes as they did.

"Holy crap Josh, she's gonna get raped!" Matt says, and looks to his side, and sees Josh missing. He then looks back at the men, and sees a shadow running along the ground. He then looks up, to see Josh jumping toward the men.

The 2 men begin to pull off the unconscious women's pants. One of the men hears a sound, but shrugs it off. Suddenly, Josh lands on the wall behind the standing man, leaving a huge circular crack in the wall. Josh jumps off the wall, spins, and kicks the standing man in his torso, knocking the guy 30 feet away, as he slides another 20 feet, crashing into some boxes, making the perfect action movie scene.

The second man stands up, his pants down, and his erect penis out. The man looks horrified, like a cornered mouse. Josh laughs, knowing that even if Josh was at his normal size, he would be able to beat the crap out of any guy with his pants down and an erection.

Josh grabs the guys face with one hand, and picks him up. Josh's first reaction is to crush the man's face. How dare he treat a women in such a way. But he couldn't. Killing the man in such a brutal way would be horrible. It would have to be indirectly Josh's fault. Josh just drops the man, who fainted out of fear.

Matt gets there just as Josh drops the man. "Call the police, and lets get out of here." Josh says.

"...Ok." Matt says, and pulls out his cell phone. But both Matt and Josh notice something. Josh slowly feels himself swell slightly. His muscles swell slightly larger, he grows slightly taller, and his genitles take up more room in his pants.

They both stare. Matt suddenly realizes whats going on. "You grow when you help people!"
122111221.title: super grow man!

choices: Josh lifts something heavy
They go somewhere else
1221112211.content:
“Charlie, we’re going to need some help unloading the truck…” a lady asked her husband, just when they pulled up with the large moving truck. They had rented a truck and relatives had helped load the truck for them, but now that they arrived at their new house, they didn’t have anyone to help them unload all the boxes and the furniture from the truck.

Matt and Josh were just walking by the house, when they overheard the elderly couple’s conversation.

“Excuse me, young man…” the old lady said to Matt, just as he and Josh were walking by. “Could you please give us a hand?”

“You kids look like you’re pretty strong…” the old man laughed, as he examined Josh from head to toe. Of course, Josh had just finished helping the other lady, after she got mugged by a gang of scoundrels, and he was still pumped up from the experience.

“Sure, mister… I can help you!” Josh replied.

Matt realized that Josh was beginning to enjoy using his massive muscles for helping others because he got the chance to use his strength, which lead to his muscles growing even bigger every time he used them.

Matt just grabbed the small boxes and light items, while Josh grabbed the large boxes using both hands.

Josh grabbed a huge box, which weighed over 80 pounds, and carried it from the truck to the front door of the house, as if it were as light as a feather!

Next, he leaped back to the street, soaring 10 feet through the air, and landing right behind the back of the truck. Then, he lifted the small couch. He casually walked back to the house, carrying the couch into the house. After he had set it in the empty living room, he leaped back and grabbed the dresser, the bed, another couch, and a recliner seat.

After a few minutes, he had emptied all the boxes and furniture from the moving truck, and everything was now stashed inside of the empty living room.

“Thank you very much, young man…” the old man said, when he realized that Josh had unloaded the van in less than five minutes. “Here, this is for your time and effort!”

The man handed Josh one-hundred Dollars!

Josh and Matt finally continued to stroll down the street, feeling great that they were able to help these elderly people.

“Dude, I think you’re growing again…” Matt said to him. “You look even bigger now!”

“Oh yeah?” Josh said, as he looked down at his massive, muscular body.

Indeed, his legs had grown another two feet longer and a foot wider, each! His arms were as massive as the pillars of a highway overpass, bulging with enormous muscle! His legs were over 4 feet wide, with giant thighs and titanic bowling-ball calves. His abdominals were like giant bathroom tiles and his pecs were the size of massive beach balls.

“Every time you use your muscles, they just grow bigger!” Matt observed. “So the more you lift, the bigger you’ll get!”

“I wonder if I should lift something that is really, really heavy…” Josh wondered.

“Well, we’ll find something for you to test your strength with!”

The two boys continued to walk down the street…

1221112212.content:
“Do you really think I grow when I help people?” Josh asked Matt.

“Sure! Look what just happened! As soon as you used your strength to help people, you started to grow even bigger!” he replied.

“Well, wouldn’t it have something to do with me using my muscles?”

“Of course!” Matt chuckled. “We can put it to the test…”

“A test?”

“Yeah… Let me try some things and see if it makes you grow…”

“Like what…?” Josh wondered.

“Why don’t you…” Matt suggested.
1221112212.title: No pain, no gain

choices: Josh finds something else to lift
Matt comes up with another plan for Josh
12211122122.content:
“Josh! You need to find something heavy to lift…” Matt said, as he looked around the driveway. “How about your mom’s car?”

“Mom’s car? That’s too heavy! Who ever heard of a kid who could lift a car?” Josh grumbled.

“Yeah but who ever heard of a kid with huge muscles?” Matt replied. “Just go lie on the floor with your back and try to bench press the bumper of your mom’s car!” he instructed.

“Are- Are you sure?”

“Yes, Josh! Just do it!” Matt ordered him.

Josh then walked to the front of the car and crawled under it and lay down on his back. Then, he raised up his arms so that he grabbed hold of the front bumper.

“No, push up like you’re trying to lift the car…” Matt ordered.

“Urrrrggggggg” Josh moaned, as he pushed up against the bumper with every ounce of strength he could muster. The car moved slightly, but not much.

Josh let go and then tried for a second time. This time, he felt as if he had suddenly become stronger, and he was able to lift the car an inch or two.

“Alright! You’re doing it!” Matt cheered.

Josh set the car down and took a deep breath. Then he tried a third time, and pressed with his hands against the bottom edge of the bumper, lifting the front of the car almost six inches off the ground.

“Whoohooo! Great job! You’re getting stronger!” Matt cheered.

Josh lowered the car to the ground and crawled out from under it. As soon as he got on to his feet, he removed his t-shirt, which was now covered with sweat.

“Wow! Look at you!” Matt exclaimed.

“What? What are you talking about?” Josh asked.

Josh ran inside and stared at his reflection in the big mirror in the bathroom. His pectorals were huge! His pecs had inflated considerably, for they had ballooned to the size of beach balls while he was busy lifting the car in the garage!

“Oh man… My chest has grown!” Josh gasped.

“Like I said… as soon as you use your muscles, they start to grow!”

“Wow…”

“We need to find other ways to make you even bigger… “Matt continued. “Until you become the biggest guy on earth…”

What are they going to do next?
12211122122.title: "... try to lift something that's heavy...

choices: He shrinks back
He grows again
1222.content:
Josh was just amazed, as he stood in the park, admiring his massive, 28-inch biceps. He couldn’t help but smile, as he felt an enormous surge of strength flowing through his arms, every time he made a fist and flexed.

“Wow… This is wonderful… I just become huge without even having to work out… I must be dreaming!” he thought to himself. Truly, he felt like he was the luckiest kid on earth.

He walked over to the monkey bars rack, and he casually placed his hand against one of the steel poles, which was supporting the rack.

Suddenly, the pole bent and snapped, startling Josh and causing him to lose his balance and fall on the sand.

When he looked up, from where he was laying, he realized that he had bent and snapped the metal, all because of his strength!

“Uh oh… I’m really strong, but I’m also really clumsy… I had better be careful…” he said, as he stood up and walked back to the monkey bars. He then grabbed the bar, which he had bent, and he bent it back. Bending steel felt like bending a toothpick!

“Wow… I wonder how strong I really am?” he pondered. “If I already get this big without working out, then what would happen, if I DID work out?”

Josh walked over to the parking lot, which was at the edge of the small park. Luckily, there was nobody around, so he had mustered enough courage to test his strength while he was out in the open.

He walked up to the parking lot, where he spotted a huge Hummer SUV. He figured that those weighed at least five-thousand pounds, and he wondered if he possessed the strength to lift it.

When he got behind the back of the Hummer, he gently placed his hands under the rear bumper of the large vehicle. Then, he flexed his biceps, and realized that he was easily able to lift the rear of the Hummer high enough, that the tires were several inches above the ground!

Then he set the Hummer back with its rear tires resting on the asphalt, before he walked back to his house, which was across the street from the small, mid-city park.

As he walked up the driveway, he got behind his dad’s old truck, and lifted that as well.

“Whoohoo! I’m giving my new biceps a little workout!” he chuckled, as he lifted the truck as if it were as light as a plastic toy car.

Then, he walked into the garage, where he spotted the weight bench, with a rack of weights attached to one end of the metallic bench.

Rather than lift up the bar, he decided to attempt to lift the entire weight bench, along with over 1,000 pounds worth of weights, and he lifted it easily!

“Now, that is what I call a workout!” he cheered. “I must be the strongest kid on earth! Now, I wonder what effect it would have on my huge muscles, if I lifted some more?”

He then lifted his father’s metal tool closet, which was filled to the top with heavy tools. Then, he lifted the old steel work bench, which weighed several hundred pounds in all.

Finally, he saw the large bulldozer, which was parked around the curb from his house, where new homes were currently under construction. It was a holiday, so the workers weren’t working on the homes at that moment, so they had left the bulldozer there. As he walked up to the large, yellow machine, he could only imagine how much it would weight.

The final test came when he walked up to the front of the bulldozer, and placed his left hand under the bumper of the vehicle. Then, he lifted the bulldozer with one hand, so that the tires left the asphalt. He set the vehicle back, and then he tried the other hand. As he lifted the large vehicle, he stared at his huge bicep in complete amazement. He just tried to imagine, what he could do with all that strength!

“There… That was fun…” he grinned, as he set the bulldozer down before he turned around and walked back to his house.

Just as he approached his driveway, he felt that same tingling in his arms. As it grew in intensity, he knew that he was going to have another growth spurt! Was it caused by his so-called workout?

“Oh man… here we go again!” he exclaimed.

Suddenly, his biceps started to inflate even more!

They were 28 inches… 29 inches… 30 inches… 31 inches… His biceps had increased again!

“Oh man… If I use my giant muscles, then they’ll grow even more!” he exclaimed, as he stared at his biceps. They almost seemed like bowling balls, which were implanted inside of his arms. They were huge!

“I wonder if I can lift more stuff, and make them grow some more?” Josh wondered, as he walked on to the lawn in front of his house.

He was completely amazed, and he could only imagine how much fun he could have if he could grow even bigger than he was now!
1222.title: Dealing with super strength

choices: Josh works out on his pecs
Josh goes to the Gym
12222.content:
Josh smiled and saw a deep crack in the ground. He thought of actually lifting the ground, but that seemed impossible. But now, Josh is the strongest teen, or being, on Earth! Josh thought how hard it was to lift the ground, but pushed it out of his mind.

Josh put his hands under the crack, and started pushing and lifting it. Josh thought that it wouldn't work, the crack was just a crack, but he was wrong. The ground was starting to move under him. The whole yard was shaking. Josh pushed even harder, his face starting to grow red. He pulled and there was a crinkling noise. The ground was starting to move!

Josh pushed even harder, his biceps swelling to a massive 37 inches! Then, with a huge BAM, the ground separated from the earth relunctanctly. Josh smiled and pulled it out. It seemed easier, and the ground was plucked out like it was a weed!

Josh lifted it with two hands and the area surrounding his house got pulled off along with the ground! Josh grunted, panting, and lifted it overhead. His biceps swelled and swelled, his bowling balls getting bigger. Josh slammed it onto the ground, and there was a gaping pit in the area where his house was.

"Wow! I must've lifted over 10 Tons there." Josh said!

Josh's arms started to tingle again. Josh smiled and let the sensation overcome him.

Josh's biceps grew again, from 39 inches...to 40 inches...43 inches...45 inches...and ended at a massive 50 inches! His biceps had biceps on top of them! Two bowling balls stacked on top of each other on a single arm!

Josh said, "Oh my god, wow. My arms are huge! They look weird on my body though. My biceps are a lot more muscular and defined than my pecs, abs, legs, backs, and the others. Hmm...."
12222.title: Josh grows even more

choices: Josh lifts a dump truck, a cement truck, or 18-wheeler
Josh lifts something else and grows even more
122221.content:
Josh and Matt decided to walk over to the small garage down the street, where Matt’s father worked. His father owned the garage, so they could walk in there anytime they wanted.

“Hey Josh, look!” Matt pointed out. “Look, they have two Hummers standing over there!”

The boys walked over to the two spots in the garage, where two large H2 Hummers were parked, side by side, while they were parked on the hoist.

“Hey, if you could find a steel bar, that I could attach to these two hoists, that the Hummers are parked on, then I could get on the floor and lift the bar, and bench press the two Hummers!” Josh suggested to Matt. “I could see if I could make my pectorals grow…”

“Two Hummers!? Dude! Each Hummer weighs about 6,000 pounds!” Matt exclaimed.

“Oh come one let me try it….” Josh insisted.

Josh got on the floor, lying on his back, right in between the two hoists, where the Hummers where parked.

Matt handed him a long, steel bar, which was long enough to be placed under the edges of the two hoists that the Hummers were parked on. Josh grabbed hold of the steel bar with both hands, as he lay on his back, flat on the floor.

Josh then grinded his teeth as he tried his hardest to push the steel bar upward, pressing the hoists containing the two Hummers higher up at the same time as well. At first, he couldn’t get either car to budge at all.

As he made his second attempt, he began to feel that burning sensation in his pectorals, as his muscles began to grow in order to come up with the necessary strength, so he could lift the two cars, which weighed about 12,000 pounds together.

Josh’s pecs started to inflate more with his second press. Slowly, the two Hummers started to lift off the ground, as Josh’s arms grew thicker while his pectorals began to grow bigger and wider while he continued to attempt to bench press. He lifted and lowered the bar again, while Matt stood and watched.

At his third attempt, his pecs grew even bigger again, growing to the size of basketballs, while pushing his shoulders out further and further as they started to push out forward at the same time.

“Wow! It’s working!” Matt cheered, as he watched Josh’s pecs swell even further. In the meantime, the two Hummers rose several inches off the floor, before Josh had to lower them to the ground again.

Josh took several deep breaths before trying again.

He placed his hands on the bar and started his next press. His huge pectorals began to burn with intense power, as they grew harder while they inflated with more power! They pushed out forward and sideways as Josh pressed the metal bar higher, while the two Hummers slowly continued to rise off the floor again. His pectorals grew like inflated balloons, seeing the need for more power and growing to give it to him. More strength! More muscle! Grow! Grow! Bigger! Bigger! His mighty pectorals were as big as beach balls now, as Josh’s huge arms were now fully extended, and the two Hummers were both raised up three feet above the ground!

But as he continued to squeeze and flex his abs together, he could feel the tingling feeling he was waiting for. As it got more intense, he persisted. Each brick in his abs flared up more and more, challenging Josh to keep going. Needless to say, Josh 'rose' to the challenge.

He could already feel every twisted clump of hard muscle in his stomach begin to grow. His whole waist was catching up to the rest of his body. He grinded each muscle together, making it grow, making each crunch easier than the last one.

Matt stared in awe at the sight of his friend growing even more. Watching his whole waist inflate with muscle like a balloon, but knowing the air was rippling, hard, strength excited Matt a lot.

Josh finally slowed and stopped his crunches. Laying back down on the rubble covered ground with a loud thud, he could still feel every muscle wrap tighter and tighter around his waist, filling with even more muscle than had been there before. With a bellow, Josh called out, not even sounding winded, "Time for the arms!"

Rolling over a gently as a muscle giant could roll, Josh turned his whole body over so his pecs rested on the ground. Although they were still a little out of proportion to the rest of his huge frame, he didn't mind. It felt good to rest his mighty body on those huge slabs of meat, feeling them wiggle and flex as he moved himself into position.

As Josh put his legs into position, reading his next move, Mark watched his thick legs crush the remains of the tree his feet had uprooted only minutes ago. Something about all of this just made him want to walk over and feel up Josh's body, but he held it in as best as he could. I mean, what would he say if he were to? What would he do if Josh let him? So, Mark pushed these thoughts out and just let the excitement resume before him.

Putting his thick hands shoulder width apart, Josh prepared himself to do some push-ups. Lifting his body in the air, he could already feel the tingles begin. This time, it wasn't only in his arms, but his back and butt as well. Josh made sure to tense every muscle he could. For Josh also was excited by all of this, and part of him wanted to see just how far it would go.

With each push-up, Josh's body would tingle more. He could feel every muscle tighten and grow at his command. His arms thickened like snaking pythons, while his shoulders blew up larger than boulders. Even a sculptor could not hope to give the kind of definition to their piece that Josh was giving himself.

Josh's back rippled as well. He could feel it fanning out and coming to life. Not only that, his butt had its own say as well. Each glute would tighten, and as he would relax it, they still felt as they had when they were tight. As he would tighten them again, they would feel even larger, and still never deflate.

The boy doing the push ups was no longer a boy. He wasn't a man. He was simply a giant, a hulk, and a muscular teen. It was hard for him to imagine how he had ever fit inside those little houses. It was harder for him to imagine how he could ever were clothes. For these things would only bound him and not let the true glory of his body be shown.

Josh finally halted his push ups and shortly after, the growth of his muscle also stopped. His muscles put all that came before him to shame. His size was so daunting, and yet he knew he could get even larger if he wanted.

Slowly standing up, Josh's rising shadow completely engulfed his little friend. Matt didn't even come up to Josh's.... well, lets just say "everything" about Josh was much bigger.

"J-Jo-Josh," Matt exhaled like a rattling gun.

Josh looked down, having barely heard this little whimper and said, "Look at me! This is all me. Every ounce and every inch is all me!"

Josh couldn't have been glowing any brighter with happiness. Mark tried to take in the whole awesomeness of his friend, but couldn't. The only thing on his mind was wanting to see him even larger. Though Josh was a tall as the trees, and had muscles by the score, he wanted to see more. And the thing was, Josh wanted more too.

141112121112.content:
“Look down there” Josh said, as he spotted a restaurant in the distance. “Can we get something to eat there?”

“I can,” Matt reasoned. “But you can’t! At least, not at that size!”

Josh was still far too big to be able to get into the building.

“Matt, I need to find a way to take control of my growth… This is getting out of hand…” Josh said, while feeling a bit concerned. “I’m starving, but I’m too big to get into the pizza place! To make matters worse, I don’t know if I’m going to shrink back now or a thirty minutes from now…”

“Well, didn’t figure out a few days ago, that a TV remote would make you shrink or grow?” Matt reminded Josh. “And, couldn’t we use the same remote to make your muscles shrink or grow as well?”

“Yeah, but we don’t have a remote with us…” Josh sighed.

“Wait… Set me on the ground, Josh! I’ll run in the pizza place. Maybe they have TV sets hanging from the ceiling…” Matt wondered. “I have an idea!”

“Okay…” Josh said sadly, as he bent down and gently set Matt on the ground. “Hurry back, okay? I’m hungry!”

Matt thought it was funny that his giant friend was totally depending on him to help him out. Here he was, an average kid, and he was helping out Josh, who was the tallest and strongest kid in the world! Luckily, Josh was also the nicest kid around, and Matt was happy that these muscle growth spurts weren’t happening to a kid who was a bully. Josh was anything but a bully, and there wasn’t anybody around who was more deserving of growing huge and muscular than Josh!

When Matt came out of the restaurant, he was holding a remote control for one of the TV sets in the restaurant. He aimed the remote at Josh, and pressed the Channel Down button. Immediately, Josh started to shrink rapidly!

“Whoaoaoaoa!” he shouted, as his body started to dwindle down in size. Within a few moments, Josh had shrunk all the way back to his normal size again, including his clothes! Matt kept on pressing the button until the shrinking stopped, which was when Josh reached his normal height again.

“Oh man! It worked!” Josh gasped. “I’m back to normal again!”

Matt briefly pressed the Channel Up button, while pointing the remote straight at Josh, just as a test. Right away, Josh started to grow a little bigger!

“Whoa!” Josh gasped, when he felt the sudden growth spurt. He suddenly grew by three inches.

“Heheh…” Matt chuckled, “That worked, too! I can control your growth with any TV remote control! We’ll just go by my house and pick up my old remote control from my TV set at home, and I’ll just carry it with me wherever I go…”

“Brilliant!” Josh cheered. “That way, you can make me shrink, in case I have another growth spurt!”

“You’ll still have your random growth spurts, Josh…” Matt observed. “At least, we can control them a little bit, now…”

“Yeah, although…” Josh thought out loud. “I just hope it doesn’t cause my muscles to have even more random muscle growth spurts because of this…”

“We’ll see… At lease, we have a way to shrink you back in case you become huge again!” Matt grinned. “From now on, I’ll carry my remote control with me, and I can control the size of your body and your muscles with this…”

“Good… Can you please shrink me back to normal?” Josh asked him, since Matt had made him a few inches taller than before.

“Oh, sure Josh…”

Matt pointed the remote at Josh and pressed the Channel down button. Josh started to shrink down again and stopped when he had reached his original height.

“There! Now, let’s go in and eat!” Matt said, as he opened the large, glass door to the restaurant.

The boys walked in and ordered a large ham and cheese pizza, which they split among the two of them. Afterwards, they left the restaurant, and they started to walk around the neighborhood again.

Josh’s pectorals began to inflate rapidly, quickly pushing out further of his chest, and straining his t-shirt. His pecs hardened as they began to grow bigger and bigger, while quickly growing outward at the same time.
