I almost wish you were even BIGGER than this…” Matt said softly, as he rubbed his hand over Josh’s mighty abdominals. “I’d love to see you grow more…”

Suddenly a bright light started to shine on them from the sky! The whole sky lit up, as if there was a small but very bright object hovering directly over Josh’s house! Then, as if it was an answer to Matt’s wish, the bright light resulted in a young teenage boy being teleported on to Josh’s patio, standing directly opposite Josh and Matt. The boy was shorter than both Matt and Josh, and he looked like a normal human being, but he was very muscular as well.

“Greetings, earthlings!” the boy said. “I’m the alien, who has made you grow!” he said, as he pointed at Josh. “I have been following you ever since I changed you, and I’ve seen the friendship between you two. Since you have no control over your growth, I have decided to come back and grant your friend the ability to make you shrink or grow!”

“What?” Matt wondered. “What are you talking about?”

“If Josh were to have the power to make his own body grow as big as he wanted, then there would be the possibility of corruption. So, I will grant that ability to somebody else instead. Since you’re his best friend, I’ll give that power to you. So, from now on, you will have complete control over the size of any part of Josh’s body. You can make him grow to any size, and shrink him back to normal size again, but he will never become smaller. And there is no limit to how big Josh can become! You may grow his muscles to any size you wish without hurting him!” the alien continued.

“Oh wow!” Josh gasped, when he heard that.

“From now on, Matt will be able to control the size of your muscles just by imagining how big you’ll become!” the alien summarized. Then the alien boy pointed his finger at Matt, and a red beam came from his finger, striking Matt in the chest. A red glow surrounded his body for a few seconds, before it disappeared.

“I will follow you, to see how it goes. Have a great day!” the alien boy spoke, before he teleported away and disappeared before their very eyes.

“Whoa! This means, I can make you grow?” Matt asked Josh.

“I guess so!” Josh replied.

Matt then stared at Josh and imagined Josh growing a foot taller than he was now.

Suddenly, Josh felt a tingling in his legs. Indeed, his legs started stretching out, and Josh started to grow taller!

“Hey! What’s going on?” Josh gasped, as he started to grow.

“Ha ha! It works!” Matt laughed, as he watched Josh grow from 7 feet to 8 feet tall!

“Did you do this?” Josh wondered, as soon as the growth stopped.

“Yeah! It really works!” Matt cheered. “I can make you shrink, or grow! That means I can make you as big as I want, or I can shrink you back to normal size again, whenever I want!”

“Dude! That’s awesome!” Josh chuckled. “You can make me grow during the day and shrink me back at night so I can fit inside of the house!

“Yeah… I can make you grow if anyone’s bugging me at school, too!” Matt pondered.

Matt already started thinking of all the fun he was going to have; now he could control Josh’s growth.
144.title: Matt’s Power to grow Josh’s Muscles

choices: Matt teleports Josh to school.
Matt teleports Josh so he can help people.
Matt teleports Josh and makes Josh's muscles grow.
1442.content:
“Well, it’s getting late…” Matt noted, as he looked up and noticed that it was starting to get dark outside. “I’d better get home soon, before mom starts calling me on my cell phone…”

“Okay, Matt… Well, see ya later…” Josh said, as he started to turn around and get back in his house.

Matt turned around and started to walk home. Almost immediately, he started to miss his best friend. With every step he took, he saw the distance between him and Josh’s house get bigger and bigger, and he knew that he was missing Josh more and more. Now that Josh had the ability to grow into this big muscle guy, and Matt had the ability to make his muscles grow, he really wanted to spend more time with him. Matt started to feel sadder, but he knew he had to get back home. Right away, he decided to call Josh as soon as he had finished eating supper.

When matt and his parents had finished having supper, Matt got up and helped washing the dishes. Then, he went into his room and closed the door. He grabbed his cell phone and dialed Josh’s number. When Josh finally answered, he cheered out loud.

“Man, I wish you were here in my room, big guy” Matt said to him over the phone. “I miss you like crazy!”

“Yeah, I know…” Josh replied. “I just had dinner myself…”

“I wanna have some fun growing your muscles… Do you feel anything right now?” Matt asked him.

Suddenly Josh noticed his biceps were increasing in size! He was growing stronger and stronger!

“Ooooh! My arms! Hey! You’re making my biceps bigger, aren’t you? Matt?” Josh replied.

“Yeah! Haha! I love the fact that I can make you grow from a distance! Josh? Are you there? Hello?” Matt said when he started to get the idea that Josh’s phone had gone dead.

Indeed, Matt had made Josh’s biceps so big, that Josh had accidentally crushed his cell phone, due to his increased strength and his enormous grip in his hands. His cell phone broke as he was speaking to Matt.

“Darn it… Where did he go?” Matt said sadly, as he hung up the phone, not knowing that it was his muscle growth that had caused Josh to break his cell phone. “I wish I could be with Josh any time I wanted…” Matt sighed, as he walked over to the window.

“Why are you so sad, Matt?” a voice spoke, which came from behind him.

Matt gasped as he turned around and spotted a muscular boy with blond hair, who was wearing a suit that made him look like a gymnast. The boy was friendly and short, he looked like he was about ten years old, and he looked like he was very athletic. He wore blue boots and gloves and he wore a red suit made of Spandex.

“Who… Who are you?” Matt wondered.

“Just call me Alien… “The boy replied. “I’m the one who made Josh so strong. I’m also the one who gave you the ability to make Josh’s muscles grow, remember? I think I erased your memory, that’s why you don’t remember me…”

“Ooh… Well I can make Josh’s muscles grow, but I don’t always get to be with him whenever I want to…” Matt said in a sad tone of voice. “Like you… How did you get in my room, anyway?”

“I teleported… Like this!” Alien said.

Then the alien boy disappeared and reappeared again, standing on the opposite side of Matt’s bedroom.

“Over here, Matt!” the friendly boy chuckled.

Matt turned around and gasped, when he realized how the alien boy has teleported to the other side of the room. Then, in a blink of an eye, the boy had disappeared again!

Suddenly, Alien appeared again, standing right before Matt!

“Whoa! That’s awesome!” Matt exclaimed. “I wish I could do that!”

“Well, I can only give you the power to teleport someone else…” Alien explained. “In your case, I will give you the ability to teleport Josh! Would you like that?”

“Sure! How does it work? Is it hard?”

“Not at all! You just wish out loud where you want Josh to be, and he’ll teleport there!” Alien explained. “Do you want me to grant you this ability now?”

“Yes! Please!” Matt cheered.

Alien pointed his finger at Matt and a red laser beam came from it, striking Matt in the chest. After a few seconds, it stopped, and Alien was gone, leaving Matt alone in his room again.

“Whoa! That was amazing!” Matt said out loud. “I wonder if it works…”

Matt then turned around and faced his empty bedroom.

“I wish Josh were standing next to me in my bedroom right now!”

Suddenly, in a flash, Josh popped up, and was standing right next to Matt!

“Hey! What… What am I doing here? Matt? Where am I? How did I get here?”

“I teleported you!” Matt cheered. “It worked! Whoohooo!”

Josh’s mouth dropped wide open as he stared at his best friend in complete disbelief.

“Say what?”

“I can teleport you now!” Matt explained. “Alien gave me the ability to teleport you, so I can have you stay with me whenever I want! I can send you anywhere I want to! Isn’t that great?”

“You’re kidding!”

“Wait… I’m gonna send you to the other end of my room…” Matt said.

Suddenly, Josh had disappeared and he popped up standing next to the door to Matt’s room. Both boys were completely amazed by Matt’s new ability to teleport Josh anywhere he wanted! So, Matt could have Josh be with him wherever he went!
1442.title: Matt gains the power to teleport Josh anywhere.

choices: Matt teleports Josh and grows his muscles again.
Matt teleports Josh so he can perform heroics.
14423.content:
“We should test these new powers” said Matt “Why don’t we go outside and test them?”

“But Matt it’s late at night and we can’t go out without our parents noticing it” Said Josh concerned.

“Well… I can teleport you outside of my room, and then I’ll get out through the window. No one will notice it.”

“Yet again Matt, your room is on the second floor, how do you plan to get out?” Josh answered logically.

“Well, I can make you big enough for me to hop onto your hand, and that way I will be able to enter into my room again. Shall we try it?”

“Sure!” Josh shrugged. “It sounds like fun!”

Matt walked up to his window and pulled on the string, which raised his blinds. Then, he pushed his window open wide, which allowed the outside air to come into the bedroom.

Matt then looked down and saw the grass below his window.

“Josh can stand right over there” he thought to himself. Then he turned around and looked at his friend, who was still standing in the room. “Are you ready?”

“Yeah…” Josh replied.

“Okay, I want Josh to stand outside below the window to my room!” Matt commanded.

Suddenly, Josh vanished from matt’s bedroom and he appeared outside, standing on the patch of grass, which was right under the window of Matt’s bedroom! Josh looked around and realized that he had been teleported, when it dawned on him that he was no longer standing in Matt’s bedroom.

“Whoa!” he exclaimed, as he looked up and saw matt staring down at him from his window. “I barely noticed that you teleported me!”

“That was so cool!” Matt cheered. “Now I’m going to make you grow, Josh!”

Josh now started to feel a tingling throughout his entire body, not just in his muscles. Luckily, he was wearing a Speedo, which was pretty stretchy so it would stay on him if Matt would make him bigger.

Josh’s body started to grow bigger and bigger. He grew taller as his arms, legs and feet continued to grow in proportion. He started to grow past 6 feet tall. As Josh looked up, he saw Matt’s window come closer and closer to him, as he continued to rise up further from the ground. After a few moments, Josh was standing 7 feet tall… 8 feet… 9 feet… 10 feet… Until he reached nearly 12 feet tall, making him twice as big as the average human being. He was now approaching the second floor window, where Matt was looking out.

“Hey, big guy!” Matt chuckled. “This is such a cool view from up here, just to watch you grow! It’s the coolest thing to see…”

Matt just LOVED to watch Josh grow, and he wanted to use his power on Josh every day!

When Josh’s head had reached the window, Matt just climbed on to his huge shoulder and sat down.

“Ahh what a view… I got my own giant friend!” Matt laughed.

Then Josh began to walk, with Matt sitting on his shoulder. Josh was now a 12-foot giant!

What would they do next?
14423.title: Matt teleports Josh and makes Josh's muscle...

choices: Matt teleports Josh to make more heroics
Matt and Josh go back home
144232.content:
All of the sudden the sound of sirens could be heard in the distance. Josh and Matt started to see a lot of smoke and they knew there must be a fire somewhere in the distance. Matt and Josh shared glances.

“We must do something” said both Matt and Josh at the unison

Carrying Matt on his arm Josh started to run faster than any human could with the help of his super strong legs. Jumping every once in a while to cut the length. He could easily follow the ambulance and the fire trucks. It took him about 20 minutes to start seeing the flames. It was really away from the city, but with the wind the fire could extend to the city. There was no way the fire trucks will make it on time. Josh decided he would have to be faster.

All of this time, Matt was being firmly held by his friend. The feeling of the hard gigantic muscles against the soft skin was impressive. Matt was living the moment of his life. He felt like a child on his friends arm, but he didn’t cared. All of the sudden Josh stopped.

“I think I’ll have to leave you here Matt” Josh said looking his best friend on the eyes. “You’ll have to teleport me to the fire. I don’t want you to get hurt by the fire”

“But… What about you Josh?” Asked Matt, worried about his friends fate

“If you make me big enough the fire won’t hurt me” said Josh logically “Besides the fire is at the woods, you just have to teleport me from the lake and I’ll be alright”

“Are you sure you really want to do this? I don’t want you to get hurt. I love you a lot to let you go by yourself” After realizing he has just said the L word Matt blushed. He saw how his friend blushed too. Then Josh grabbed him by the waist and lifted him until they were both eye level. Josh pulled Matt closer to him, until their lips met and melted on a passionate kiss.

“I’ll be alright” said Josh braking the kiss “besides, if I don’t do something the city will get into fire. You can teleport me whenever you want if you think I’m in danger.”

“OK” said Matt looking Josh on the eyes “Let’s do it”

After Josh put Matt on the ground he concentrated, making Josh disappear. He teleported Josh near the lake and made him grow bigger and bigger. He saw how the huge bulk of his friend started to grow at the light of the fire. He kept growing until he was over 200 ft tall, his size overshadowing the flames and the trees. Then Matt saw how Josh kneeled and grabbed some water from the lake by cupping his hands. After he doused most of the fire he used his huge feet to stomp over the few fires that were still on feet. Suddenly Matt heard the fire truck coming nearer. He knew he had little time for taking back his friend before he was noticed. Matt closed his eyes and suddenly Josh was in front of him.

“There you are my superhero” jumped Matt excited over the 5’4’’ Josh. Matt didn’t realize he has shrunk his friend back to his original size “How was it? Did it hurt?” Asked Matt as he covered his friend with hugs

“It didn’t hurt at all” said Josh proudly “It feels so great being a hero… thank you” he said looking up at Matt shyly.

It took a moment for them to realize Josh’s Speedo just couldn’t hold the humongous cock of giant Josh, ripping it apart. Once they realized it just make an awkward moment for both of them.

“Do you want me to teleport you to your house so you can pick something to wear?” asked Matt to Josh blushing. “Or do you think we can do more heroics?”

“Why don’t you just grow me to my 12’ size tall first? That way we can go back to your home”

“Sounds ok to me” said Matt, and with the power of his mind Josh grew again to the huge 12’ titan he loved so much.
144232.title: Super-Josh

choices: Another accident happens and Josh and Matt enter in action.
Josh and Matt test the new gifts the alien gave them.
They go back to school
1443.content:
“Matt” Josh said shyly “Can I ask you something?”

“Sure, Josh!” said Matt “Whatever you want…”

“Could you get me back to my size?” asked Josh “I mean, I love being big and everything but… It’s just too scary to be this big all of the sudden and… and I’m used to being the smallest… It’s just weird… please.”

Matt heard his friend talking to him and his eyes filled with tears as he heard his huge friend’s voice. Even though Josh was so big and muscular; he still had the big heart of his little self. Matt closed his eyes and concentrated on Josh shrinking back to his original size.

“Are you feeling alright now?” Matt said while looking down on his friend.

“Yeah, Thanks! At least now that you can control my height the growth spurts won’t be so spontaneous. I feel safer now that you have the power to control my growth.” Josh said as he began to blush a little since he noticed that he was naked now.

His Speedo was too stretched out from his growth and now it was useless. Matt noticed it too and he also blushed slightly even though he didn’t feel uncomfortable about seeing his friend naked, but he knew that Josh was a very shy guy, so he turned around.

“Let me look for some clothes” Josh said as he ran to his room.

Once Josh came back he saw Matt sitting on the coach smiling. He was thinking about everything he could do with his new powers over Josh’s body.

“Tomorrow is going to be such a great day” said Matt “If someone tries to bully another kid I’ll just make you grow big enough to beat the bullies.”

“The thing is” argued Josh “That I don’t want to bully other bullies. I want to make a difference.”

“Maybe you could just intimidate them with your size?” said Matt “What do you think we can do with my new powers? What would you like to do?”

“Well… I was thinking about this” said Josh blushing “and I think I’d like to be a… superhero.”

“A superhero?” asked Matt.

“Yeah, isn’t that weird?”

“Nah. You’ve always had a huge heart, and now I have the power to grow your body and muscles to the size of your heart. You could be a great superhero Josh… maybe we can help people together.”

“Do you think so?” said Josh excited “Wow. I’ve always wanted to save people.”

It was late already, and Josh and Matt had school the next day. Both of them were eager to test their new powers.

“Do you want to sleepover at my house?” asked Matt blushing “Just in case you want to feel better.”

“Of course! It will be great. Just let me grab my pajama and my backpack, and ask my mom’s permission to go”

After some time, Josh and Matt were finally at Matt’s home where they would spend the night together. The next morning they had school, and everything went normal until lunch. While Josh and Matt were at the cafeteria of their school something happened. One of the bridges of the town started to fall down. The news spread all around until Josh and Matt heard it.

“Josh” whispered Matt “I think we can help with that.”

“Do you mean… using your power to make me huge and save the bridge?” answered Josh excited “Let’s do it!”

“Follow me” said Matt as he slipped away from the mass of worried student’s whose parents may be on the bridge going to work. Matt led Josh to the school’s hall.

“Why did you take me here?” asked Josh to Matt.

“I have an idea, but you’ll have to grow gigantic to save the bridge” said Matt “and ever since you are so shy to show the world your privates, I think we could use the curtains from the School’s hall to cover your body. Now take off your clothes”

“What!?” asked Josh “What did you say?”

“You are growing to grow gigantic and muscular, and if you want to have clothes once I get you back to your normal size, you’ll have to take them off if you don’t want to rip them all. If you want, I can turn myself around.” answered Matt in a hurry. They may not have much time left.

“OK” said Josh as he did what he was told. He really trusted Matt, and the idea of being a superhero exited him.

Once he was naked, and Josh and Matt removed the curtains and took them out off the school (Matt actually made Josh 8 foot and over 700 pounds of muscle to make the work easier), Matt started to concentrate on Josh growing to a colossal size. Matt stared in awe as his friend grew to 10 ft, 25 ft, 50 ft, breaking the 100 ft mark.

Josh stopped at 200 ft. Matt looked so tiny and frail in the ground, so Josh lifted him and put him over his shoulder. Next, he covered his private parts with the curtains (that didn’t do the best work, but they did hide something) and started to walk towards the bridge, making sure not to step on anything of value.

Josh’s muscles were huge. Even if Josh was normal sized, his muscles would still make a bodybuilder look skinny. Josh’s body cast a huge shadow over everything on the ground. All his muscles look pumped, and they were big and hard all around. His muscles looked hard enough to crush diamonds.

“What shall we do once we are there?” asked Josh in his booming voice.

“Once we are there you’ll use your huge muscles and size to hold the bridge.” said Matt “and then I’ll make you grow big enough so you can hold the bridge with your other hand, and with your free hand you’ll rub your fingers to make enough friction and heat to mend the wires that hold the bridge in the air.”

“You’re a smart tiny guy, aren’t you?” said Josh making his now little friend blush.

Once they were at the bridge everything started to go according to plan. Josh was so strong that he had to be careful to not to destroy the bridge, in fact he was so strong he could carry the whole weight under one hand, showing a huge bicep to the people below.

At first sight people were scared of what they were seeing, believing Josh would kill them, but once they saw him welding together the broken lines, they started to cheer Josh, their superhero.

Once the problem was solved Josh flexed his muscles for the audience and he started walking away. When they were distant, Matt started to shrink Josh back to his normal size.

“Wow Josh! You were great!” said Matt excited “You were a real superhero!!!”

“Thank you, but it was all your idea, you deserve the credit…” said Josh blushing.

Suddenly a bright green light covered both of them, and the next thing they saw was the little alien that gave them their powers.

“Greetings earthlings!” he said “You’ve passed your test!”

“You mean you did all of this just to test us?” said both Josh and Matt.

“I had to get sure that you would use your powers to do good…” said the tiny alien “and now that I see I couldn’t give these powers to someone better I’ll give you these!”

Suddenly another green light covered both of them. Josh was covered wearing a green and blue Spandex suit, with boots and gloves, while Matt could feel his head different.

“This suit will grow with you without hurting you, no matter how big you become, so you won’t have to be naked anymore” the alien said to Josh “and from now on you’ll have the power to read Josh mind, so you can make him grow even when you are far away.”

“I know you’ll save the world” said the little alien as he disappeared again, leaving both Josh and Matt who looked excited to each other.

“I can’t believe it!!” said both of them at the same time.

“Now you’re not Josh anymore, but SuperJosh!” said Matt.

“Isn’t it great??”
1443.title: SuperJosh

choices: Matt decides to make Josh's body grow again
Matt makes Josh's muscles grow again
14432.content:
After Josh had finished rescuing people from the stricken bridge and he and Matt had an encounter with the alien, Matt had received the power to read Josh’s mind and Josh had received a super-stretchy spandex suit, which would always stretch no matter how big Matt would allow Josh to grow! That way, Josh would never be left standing naked again, in case Matt made him burst out of his clothes.

Now that they had completed their rescue, they decided to home since school was already over and they were only a few blocks away from the bridge.

“We need to go home, Josh!” Matt said to him. “Otherwise we’ll get home too late!”

“Well, make me big again, so I can carry you home…” Josh suggested.

“Good idea!” Matt grinned.

Then, Matt just stared at his friend with a wide grin on his face as he watched Josh’s body grow with ease. Josh immediately felt the tingling through his body as Matt’s power went to work in him. His legs started to grow rapidly as well as his arms and his torso grew wider and longer in proportion. Luckily, his stretchy suit grew along with his body, so he didn’t burst out of any clothing.

Josh grew in height at an alarming rate! He shot up, from 5 foot 4 to 6 feet… 7 feet… 8 feet… Until he was standing about 20 feet tall! He was now three times as big as Matt, and Matt only came just to above his knees!

Josh then reached down and scooped up Matt with his huge hand. Matt only smiled, knowing very well what Josh had in mind, since he now knew exactly what Josh was thinking at all times! Josh lovingly held Matt in his left hand and pressed him gently against his rock-hard chest, as he started running towards the street using his mighty, long legs. When he came to the street, he spotted an oncoming bus. Of course, Josh was much too big for the bus, so he started running after the bus and with one mighty leap; he landed on the roof of the moving bus and remained standing on it like he was standing on a skateboard!

“Whoooohooooooo!” Josh cheered, as he stood sideways on the bus, with one arm extended while holding Matt in the other arm.

“Josh!” Matt shouted. “That was incredible!”

“We’re riding the bus like a skateboard, dude!” Josh chuckled. “So, hang tight!”

People everywhere were looking at the giant boy who was standing on top of the bus. Some thought it was some propaganda stunt or some advertising gimmick. Everybody stopped to look at the giant, muscular, 20-foot-tall muscle boy who was “skating” on top of the large moving bus as it moved along the busy roads.

Finally, when the bus came close to the street where Matt and Josh lived, Josh leaped off the bus and landed on the sidewalk.

It was just a short walk for Josh, using his long, powerful legs, until he reached Matt’s house. When he reached the front door to the house, he set Matt on the ground.

“That was fun!” he grinned, as he looked down at his best friend.

“Yeah, we should go to school like that every day!” Matt replied, as he looked up to Josh as he silently ordered Josh’s body to shrink back.

Immediately, Josh felt that familiar tingling again and his body started to shrink back from the height of 20 feet to his original height of 5 foot 4 inches tall in a matter of seconds. What felt like standing in an elevator which was dropping several floors, Josh swung his arms sideways as he rapidly dwindled back to his original size. Within seconds, he was staring at matt, face-to-face.

“Wow, that is such a rush… Even when you make me shrink back, that is such an awesome feeling…” Josh laughed.

“Dude, you’re just an awesome guy, no matter what size you are!” Matt chuckled.

“Aww, Matt… “Josh said as he blushed. “I appreciate that…”

“Of course, I’d rather make you big and see you grow…” Matt laughed. “But I have to shrink you back now and then in order for me to make you grow later…”

“Thanks…” Josh replied. “You know how much I love that…”

“You don’t have to tell me… I already read it in your mind, dude…” Matt chuckled.

What would Matt and Josh do next?
14432.title: Josh and Matt test the new gifts the alien gave...

14433.content:
Josh and Matt had to go back to school, after all superheroes need education too. Luckily for lunch time was enough to go back to school and fix the curtains they have borrowed. Unluckily for them they couldn’t have any lunch that day and by the end of school they were starving.

“Gee! I’m so hungry I could eat a horse” said Josh to his friend Matt as they were walking towards home.

“I can bet that you are really hungry big boy” said Matt as he put an arm around his buddy’s shoulder and said softly so no one could hear him “After all you just saved a lot of people today. You deserve a huge meal for saving that bridge my giant friend”

The comment made Josh blush a little. He was such a shy boy, and now that his dream of becoming a superhero has come true he just couldn’t believe it. And just before Josh could share another word to Matt they stopped because a big crowd was in their way.

“What do you think is happening?” said Josh to Matt

“I don’t know” answered Matt “Let’s find out” he said as he started growing his friend tall enough his head and shoulders were over the crowd. He grew his muscles a little, and he decided to take it easy so he won’t look huge, so he decided to give him that look of a swimmer… for now.

“Matt!!! What are you doing?” said Josh to his little friend

“What I did” said Matt, looking up to his taller friend “Was making you 7’6’’ so you were head and shoulders above the crowd and we could see what’s going on” then he made a brief pause “So… are you going to lift me or will you tell me what’s going on?”

“Sorry” said Josh shyly as he lifted his friend and out him over his shoulders. “Look, it’s a carnival coming to town” said Josh to Matt “Would you like to in the afternoon?”

In that moment Matt saw “The World’s Strongest Man” walking on the little parade that was going on the street. Then he had a sudden idea. He would show them who really the world’s strongest man was. Just that thought have already make Josh’s muscles grow a little.
“I think we should go this afternoon” said Matt with a grin “I think we will have a lot of fun”

Once the parade was over, Matt shrank Josh back to normal and they walked home again. Josh had no idea what Matt had in mind, but he was as excited about going to the carnival that afternoon.
14433.title: The carnival arrive's the town

144331.content:
After a big lunch for both Josh and Matt, and after finishing their homework, both of them asked their parent’s permission to go to the Carnival.

“Did you finish your homework already?” said Josh’s mother.

“Yes mom” said Josh “You know I always do my homework”

“And who are you going with?” said Josh’s mom concerned about his little boy “You are not thinking about going alone, are you?”

“No mom” argued Josh “I’m going with Matt”

“OK sweetheart” said his mother “You can go, but get sure to come back home before dinner”

“Thanks mom” said Josh giving her mother a sweet kiss. Josh was never embarrassed of being affective with her mother… as long as no one else was watching him.

Josh left her house and prepared himself for the Carnival. He was ready to visit it. He started to walk towards his friend’s house when he, all of the sudden, appeared I front of his friend’s house.

“Hi Josh” said Matt ready to go “I teleported you” he said after seeing his best friend’s confused look.

“Dude, don’t do that without warning me” said Josh “I’m not used to being teleported… besides you could have teleported me in front of my mother”

“Don’t worry about that” said Matt “Don’t you remember I can read you mind?”

Josh smiled to his friend as they started walking towards the carnival. He was not used to his friend’s new powers. “I’m so happy” he thought “That such a great friend like Matt has such powers over my body”

“Are you sure you don’t want me to teleport you to the Carnival?” asked Matt

“But what about you?” said Josh “You can’t teleport yourself”

“Maybe if we hold each other I will be teleported with you” said Matt as he hugged his friend and vanished into thin air only to appear in front of the Carnival seconds after.

“Look! It worked” said Matt to his friend who was blushing. “Sorry” said Matt looking down to his little friend “Maybe next time we will just hold hands” he said.

“Yes… maybe that will be better” said Josh as he felt himself grow a little taller until he was eye level with Matt.

“Sorry” said Matt “It’s just that I don’t like looking down at you. You look much better when you are tall”

“Thanks” said Josh “I’m beginning to like being tall and strong” he said blushing “So… would you like some cotton candy?”

“That would be great” said Matt “Wanna race?”

And just like that both boys begun racing. Usually Matt would win, but now that they were both the same size Matt was actually having a hard time. In fact he made his friend’s legs stronger the last minute so he would win the race.

“Hey! That’s not fair” said Josh “You cheated”

“You are the only one I know” said Matt “Who would argue about his friend’s cheating to help his best friend win a race. You really have the heart of a hero”

After a watching all the shows in the Carnival Matt decided to start his plan. First he took his friend with the strong men who was lifting huge weights. Impressing all the people with his strength.

“Hey Mister” said Matt “I bet my friend here can lift more than you can”

“Matt! What do you think you are doing?!” said Josh facing his friend.

“Relax dude, I just want to show this wimp who is the strongest man in the world” said Matt totally confident

“You are going to get us in trouble” said Josh

“Well…” said the strongman to Josh “If your friend if so sure about your abilities, why don’t you show us what you can do”

The strongman was a really big man, about 6’5’’ in height and with incredible muscles. Josh felt a little intimidated about his size, so he obediently followed the man orders and got on the stage.

“What are you doing?” asked Josh to Matt with the psychic connection they had, another of the powers his alien friend gave them.

“Don’t worry Dude” answered Matt with his mind powers “Everything it’s going to be all right”

“So…” said the strongman to Josh “Why don’t you show us your strength?”

Josh walked towards the loaded bar that the strongman had for the show. First he waited Matt to make him grow, but as minutes went by and nothing happened Josh decided to try to lift the weight by his own. In the same moment Josh started trying to lift the weight his muscles started to grow until he was able to lift it, and as he kept lifting it over and over he grew bigger and taller. Josh’s growth spurt ended when he was exactly the same size and weight of the strongman.

“It looks to me that he is as strong as you” said Matt to the scared bodybuilder.

“How did you do that?” said the bodybuilder with his mouth wide open. He was really scared, but his proud won’t let him scare.

“Hi. My name is Josh” said Josh as he dropped the weight, which made a loud “thump” as it hit the stage, convincing the people the weight was really heavy, and shacked hands with the strongman.

“Wow kid! How did you grew so big” said the strongman still shaking a little

“Oh! My friend here helped me” said Josh as Matt started to get onto stage. The bodybuilder looked at the young boy walking next to his friend.

“You know what?” said Matt “Josh looks as strong and you, but I told you he was stronger than you”

And just like that Josh’s height and muscles started to increase until he was 12’10, exactly two times the strongman height and over 12 times his weight ever since his muscles grew more massive than they were already.

“Looks like we have a winner” said Matt “Ahem! Josh I have to lift you arm, but since you are that tall, would you give me a hand”

“Sure” said Josh as he lifted his friend holding him by the hand.

This time the strongman was pretty scared and he was about to run when the giant in front of him grabbed him with one of his gigantic hands. The crowd, who were thinking it was a trick, realized this was real and some started to run. Other’s stayed there admiring the young giant muscular lad.

“Matt” said Josh as he saw the strongman frightened face “You better shrink me back to normal before the reports come by”

“Aww” said Matt “Just when I was beginning to have fun” but he obediently shrunk his friend back to his size.

“Don’t worry” said Matt to the strongman who looked as if he was about to cry “My friend here is so gentle he would never hurt anyone” Then he added “By the way, my name is Matt”

“I’m Carl.” Said the strongman “And I’ve never seen something like that”

“Don’t worry sir” said Josh “It was great to meet you”

“Yeah” said Matt “Hey Josh! Look at the hour dude. We better go back home or we will be late for dinner.”

“Ok Matt” said Josh “See you later Carl” said Josh to the strongman “We’ll come back tomorrow”

Then Josh grabbed Matt’s hand and disappeared in front of Carl and the audience.

“I hope to see them tomorrow” said Carl

145.content:
"Oh no!" Josh moaned, but his worried words couldn't stop the growing.

Just then, Matt walked in. "Jos, what happens?" he asked. "What was that tnonsense about grow... AAAAAH!"

Matt had arrived just in time to see his friend having another awesome growth spurt, and like before, not only his height increased, but his muscles started to inflate.

While Matt looked in amazement, Josh' head was lifted up and up by the transformation, and the boy's arms bulged with iron muscles, his legs and calves turning into pillars of flesh.

"Ouch!" Josh cried when his head hit the ceiling, and he grimaced, not only in pain but in amazement as well: he was now nearly 12 feet tall!

Matt's mouth gaped open a few times, before he found enough breath to speak.
"G... guy, what the hell happened to you?" he asked, looking up to his now gargantuan pal.

"I dunno!" Josh replied, and it seemed odd to Matt seeing such a massive person acting so meek and scared. "I just helped that alien earlier..." and suddenly, almost without realize it, the boy recalled his meeting with the small alien, and told Matt about it.

Matt scratched his head. "If I didn't see that with my own eyes, I would never believe that story." he commented, then smiled, adding; "Well, that alien has given an awesome gift to you."

"Are you joking?" Josh cried, desperate. "Look at me, I'm a freak! What could I do?"

"What?" Matt said with a smile. "There are lots of possibilities; for instance, you could..."
145.title: Matt comes in

choices: Josh grows to 8 feet tall with huge muscles
Josh's muscles inflate even more
1452.content:
“Dude… I gotta find out how to shrink back!” Josh cried out to Matt.

Matt found it amusing that he was staring at his friend from school, who was towering over him. In fact, Josh was standing twice as tall as him!

“Why? You look awesome!” Matt chuckled. He tilted his head and examined his giant friend from head to toe. He was amused by the idea that Josh used to be a few inches shorter than him. Now, Matt barely reached past Josh’s waist! Josh’s legs were almost as long as Matt’s entire body!

“Dude! You can be everyone’s hero at school! Especially when the bullies start teasing the others…” Matt observed. “Not to mention all the fun you’d have during P.E. class!”

“Yeah but when my mom sees me like this, she’s gonna freak!” Josh replied. “I gotta figure out how to shrink back!”

“Well, how did you shrink back before?”

“Whenever I just stand around and do nothing, I shrink back after awhile…” Josh pondered.

“Why don’t you just lay on your bed?” Matt suggested.

“Okay!”

The two boys walked up the stairs to Josh’s bedroom. In fact, Josh was in front. Since his legs were long and muscular, he just made it to the top of the stairs with just three steps!

Once they arrived in the bedroom, Josh looked down and realized that he was far too big to fit on the bed.

“Just lay on the floor…” Matt said. “Maybe that will help…”

Josh just lay on the floor and closed his eyes. Matt crawled on Josh’s bed and looked down at his giant buddy, who was laying on the floor with his chest facing up.

Suddenly, Josh’s body began to dwindle back to it’s original size, as the muscles quickly deflated in just a matter of seconds. His giant pectorals deflated and shrunk back, as well as his arms and legs. His torso shrunk back too, and Josh had slowly returned to normal.

“Welcome back, little guy!” Matt chuckled, as he watched Josh stand up. “Now we need to figure out how to make you grow again, before we try this out at school!”

“I think it’s triggered when I use my muscles…” Josh wondered.

Matt got up and stood in front of Josh for a moment.

“Let’s try it on just one muscle at a time…” Matt said, as he walked around and stood behind Josh.

“Stand on your toes for a few seconds…”

“Okay!” Josh replied, as he raised up while standing on his toes. Matt looked down and saw how he flexed his calves.

“Now, get back on your feet and wait a few seconds before you do it again!”

“Okay… I’ll do it again…”

Josh stood back on his toes again, for a second time. This time, he stood for about ten seconds, before lowering back on his heels again.

“Hmm… It doesn’t appear to be working… I guess we gotta…” Matt began.

“Wait! Wait!” Josh gasped. “I feel it!”

“What? Are you growing?”

“Yes! I… I…”

“Stand right there…” Matt said, as he squatted down while standing behind Josh.

Suddenly, Josh’s calves started to vibrate. Josh let out a slight moan as he felt his legs fill with power!

“Oh my God…” Matt exclaimed as he watched how Josh’s calves began to grow. They started to blow up like balloons which were being filled with air!”

Josh’s calves filled out, pushing out backwards and sideways, forming two mighty soccer-ball-sized calves on the back of his legs, which were covered with layers of muscles and thick, red veins which were as thick as ropes.

“Awesome!” Matt said. “That is just amazing, to watch your muscles grow!”

“Well, I guess we can control it, to a certain degree…” Josh said quietly. “But it’s still very random and I just never know when I’m going to grow…”

“Yeah, but we can use your muscle growth to trap the bullies in school!” Matt observed. “Whenever you get bullied, you’re muscles will start to grow just by exerting yourself!”

“Yeah… I guess that should work…”

“Josh… You’re such a lucky bastard…” Matt laughed as he playfully punched Josh in the shoulder. “I’d kill to grow muscles like that!”

“Owww… Don’t punch me… I… I…” Josh gasped, as he reached out and covered his shoulder on the spot where Matt had punched him. ‘Oh no… Here comes…”

Matt took a step back.

“What’s going on?”

“I’m gonna grow again…” Josh gasped. “You hurt me and now my muscles are going to blow!!!!”

Matt just looked on in awe as Josh’s muscles started to grow again…

How big would Josh become this time?

15.content:
"Hey Josh... Where are you?" his mom said, as she called out for her son from the kitchen.

Josh was still in the bedroom with the door closed.

“Oh no…” he thought to himself. “If mom sees me like this, then she’ll freak!”

Obviously, it wasn’t normal for a 15 year-old boy to look like a 7 foot tall bodybuilder with 500 pounds of muscle!

Luckily, since Josh’s room was on the bottom floor of the house, he just opened the windows in his bedroom, and he easily hopped through the window and landed on a patch of grass, just a few feet below.

Then, he saw the bedroom door open, as his mother was about to walk in!

“Oh no! I need to get out of here!” Josh thought.

He looked up and then an idea came to him: He is super strong right now. How high could he leap?

He then leaped straight up into the air, soaring over the first floor and then just passing the windows of his parents room, which was on the second floor of the house.

“Yayy!” he cheered, as he gracefully landed on the roof of the house. “That was awesome! I leaped from the ground to the roof, covering 20 feet!”

Josh was amazed by his incredible strength. He was super strong!

Suddenly, he began to feel that odd tingling sensation again. Something was telling him, that he was about to shrink back to normal.

Josh jumped off the roof and landed on the grass in his back yard, just by the back door to the house.

Then, as the tingling increased in intensity, he rapidly began to dwindle back to his old self again. His huge muscles deflated like balloons, which had the air let out of them.

“Luckily I can feel these growth spurts coming for about a minute or so…” he whispered to himself.

Josh’s body rapidly shrunk back to his 5 foot 4 inches frame. He was only wearing shorts, so he didn’t rip out of any clothes!

His mother just walked out the door and into the back yard.

“Oh there you are, Josh!” she said. “You need to take out the trash, okay?”

“Sure, mom!”

Josh was relieved. His mom didn’t see him. But, when would he grow huge again, and how soon?

"Oh crap, its happening again!"
Josh's muscles slowly started to inflate, perplexing him. His head slowly starts to rise as his body gets taller and wider with muscle. Soon enough, he bumped his head against the cieling. His shirt and pants started to tear.

He made his way to the front door, still growing, with an unsuccessful attempt at getting out, his clothes still getting tighter and tighter.

Everything in Josh's body was getting bigger, especially his muscles. He estimated that he was about 15 feet right now, but he was still growing. His pants and shirt were on the brink of ripping completely. He watched helplessly as his body slowly started to fill the room, his muscles bulging. His head started to press against the cieling, so he sat down on the floor instead. Finally, as he could not bear to get any bigger, his growth stopped.
"Crap." he said to himself as he examined his massive body, his shirt entirely ripped to shreds, and his boxers barely hanging on. All of the muscles in his body were super built; his biceps, pecs, calves, everything was huge. He had to be pretty heavy too.

Sitting down, his head was about a foot from the cieling. If he grew any more, it would be pretty bad for the house. His hands were the size of a coffee table, and his biceps were almost twice that. Flexing them, he could see the veins showing and could only imagine what kind of strength he actually had.
"Maybe being huge isn't so bad after all" he told himself. But how could he test his strength being cramped up in his own house?

15111.content:
At 15 feet tall, Josh’s humongous body was filling the entire room. He was big and enjoying every minute of it. The downsize to not having any control of it is that he is now trapped in his own kitchen like Alice in the White Rabbit’s house; with his back pressing against the left wall and his legs stretching all the way to the other side of the tiny room. His body was so wide that were pushing against the cabinets and his head was awkwardly pushed against the ceiling. There was no room to move and no exit… or more accurately, there was any exit door on the kitchen that would allow a 15 ft giant to leave the kitchen without breaking it.

After a couple of minutes cramped in the tiny space, Josh became frustrated, “How fun can it be being so big if I can’t get out of here” though Josh. With his newfound strength, Getting out wasn’t the real problem as much as getting out without smashing his way out or drawing too much attention. Of course if he waited till he shrinks back down, he could get out but he’ll missed out to play with his new strength.

He pondered on his predicament until he remembered there IS a way out, one that didn’t involved breaking a wall with his bare fists or breaking through the ceiling… and it was right in front of him the whole time.

The sliding glass door on the far right of the kitchen was just wide enough to allow him to crawl out of it doing the least amount of damage possible. The only problem was that he STILL had to get rid of the door so he can escape.

“Mmm… to hell with it” Said Josh and as careful as possible, he give the door a slight kick with enough force to rip it from the wall without making too much noise and the door fall to the floor.

Without the door, Josh now has an open passage out of his tiny prison. He slowly and carefully turn himself from his sitting position into a crawling position, always careful not to break anything with his inhuman strength. He began to crawl his way out, slowly and steady. His body rose sometime against the cabinets due to his width but after a bit of fiddling, Josh was able to get himself out of the kitchen and into the Backyard.

Josh was now finally to stand up at his full height and marvel at how tiny everything was compared to him. It was so surreal; Josh was peeking directly at his room through the first floor window while standing in the backyard. Josh couldn’t resist smiling.

“This is so cool” said Josh “I’m huge”

Now that he was able to test his strength, the question was, where? , A gym was clearly out of the question, even if his gigantic height didn’t scare the crap out everyone, the gym’s equipment would pose no challenge whatsoever for him. Where would be the most isolated place with enough heavy stuff to lift? If the place was large enough, maybe it would be the best occasion to grow some more.

In the end, Josh settled for...

"I really want to see how big I can get" Josh said, looking at himself as though he had some sort of superpower.
"But how?" Matt asked, "How exactly are you going to do that when all these people will see you?"
"Wait, those woods over there outta do it." Josh pointed past his house. "They stretch for a few miles and are covered in trees."

So Josh and Matt decided to camp in the woods overnight. They let their parents know they would be gone so they won't go looking for him. Josh was sure to bring some super stretchy boxers and even a few bed comforters just in case.

He and Matt got together in the afternoon, and started walking down to the woods. There was a small trail, so they didn't have to trek through the thick bushes and plants. They walked for a few miles, and decided to rest in a seemingly comfortable spot.

"So, when are you supposed to grow?" Matt asked.
"Soon, I think, it hasn't happened since this morning...wait...I think it's starting!" Josh said.
And soon enough, Josh's body slowly started to swell. His muscles started to fill his shirt and pants, straining them until they finally ripped apart.

"Here I go" Josh said to Matt, while he was slowly rising in height.

7 ft, 8 ft, 9 ft...

He could feel his pecs pushing outward, his huge biceps pushing against the side of his torso. He loved the feeling.

10 ft, 11 ft, 12 ft...

He was now more than twice the size of Matt, and way heavier. Luckily, his super stretchy boxers were hanging in there.

But then Josh was showing signs of slowing down. Matt noticed it too. He sighed as he finally stopped at 15 feet.

"Aww come on...I want to be BIG!" Josh told himself.

Josh looked at the horizon.
"Darn, the sun is already starting to set. It'll be dark in no time..."

By now, Josh was really bored. So what do bored kids do? They watch TV. Josh's hands were too big to use the remote, so he crawled over to the TV to turn it on. He gently pressed the on button, and scrolled through the channels. But after he found a show he liked, he didn't dare sit on the couch.

When Josh got outside he felt that familiar tingling again, much to his relief since he was just starting to get used to his weird growth spurts, although he began to enjoy the feeling of being strong and muscular.

“Ooh wow, look at me!” he said, as he looked down at his titanic, muscular body. “I can’t believe how big I am! And I’m only fifteen!”

After a few moments, he felt that familiar tingling feeling again and his huge muscles started to dwindle back.

“Oh wow! I’m shrinking!” he said to himself, as he began to see everything around him grow back to normal. He got that sinking feeling, when he started to shrink. After a few moments, his huge muscles were gone, and he was his old self again!

When Josh walked back inside, his Aunt Viola had just come over!

“There’s Josh!” she shouted. Viola was a big, heavy set woman who loved giving Josh big bear-hugs. “Come give your old aunt a hug, my boy!”

Josh shyly walked over to her and the big woman wrapped her big, heavy arms around his skinny torso, almost squeezing the life out of him.

“How’s my favorite nephew doing today?” she began. “My goodness, you’re getting so big! I just wanted to wish you a happy Easter, Josh! Look, I brought you and mom some delicious chocolate Easter Eggs! I picked these up at the store myself! Aren’t they delicious?”

“Sure, Aunt Viola….” Josh said. He picked two and immediately put them in his mouth and started chewing on them. He wouldn’t dare try getting by without eating them while Aunt Viola was around!

“They’re delicious, Aunt Viola….” Josh began. “I really like…”

Suddenly, Josh felt a rumbling sound in his stomach. Then, it led to a tingling feeling in his muscles.

“Uh oh…” he wondered out loud. “I feel it… It’s happening again…”

“Like the alien said, my love for you has given me unprecedented control over your body and over your muscles! I can shrink and grow your body and your muscles, and I can also teleport you anywhere!” Matt said, as he looked up at Josh. “Here, let me shrink you back to normal…”

Just as Matt commanded, Josh was immediately overcome by an intense tingling feeling, which was all over his body.

“Hey! Whaaaaaa!” Josh yelled, as he rapidly started to dwindle back to his normal 5 foot 6 height, from the 18 feet that he had a moment before. He lost his huge muscles as well, as he rapidly shrunk back to his old self again, just as Matt had ordered. Only, he was still butt-naked.

“Now, I need to put your clothes back on ya!” Matt chuckled, as he snapped his fingers.

In a flash of blinding light which surrounded Josh’s body, Josh went from butt-naked to wearing his t-shirt and shorts along with his flip-flops on his feet again!

“Wow! This is scary!” Josh exclaimed, as he looked down and realized that he was wearing his clothes again.

Just then, Matt walked up to him with a wide grin on his face.

“Dude, you’re never gonna be a short, skinny dude again, do you realize that?” Matt said calmly. “I can make you hulk out and grow infinitely huge any time I want to, and there is no limit to how big you can get! Why, I can make you as big as the entire planet, just by saying the words… I just love watching you grow big and muscular… I love you, Josh…”

“I love you too, Matt… You’re like my brother, dude…” Josh whispered back.

Both boys embraced briefly and then pulled back, while Matt rested his arms on Josh’s shoulders.

“Nobody’s ever gonna bully or hurt you again… I will make you the biggest, tallest and strongest muscle man on earth if they even TRY!” Matt chuckled.

“Thanks, man…” Josh sighed.

As Matt looked on, Josh suddenly felt his pectorals grow harder. Then, his biceps increased in size a little, as his abdominals pushed out under his shirt.

“There… a little muscle for ya… Until we get back home… Then I might add some more…” Matt said.
154221122112.title: Matt and Josh begin to explore this new connection

choices: Matt makes Josh grow at the fair
More growth for Josh... thanks to Matt!
1542211221121.content:
Matt and Josh were walking through the hallway in school when they passed a poster which was hanging on the wall, announcing the annual fair that was being held in town the following week.

“Hey! The fair is coming to town next week! We should go!” Matt suggested.

“Sure, that sounds like fun…” Josh replied.

“It’s on the other side of town, but you can get us there, right, big guy?” Matt chuckled, as he patted Josh on the back.

“Uhh… I guess…”

“Of course! With those big, muscular legs of yours… You can get us there in a jiffy!” Matt grinned.

No sooner had Matt said that, or Josh felt a tingling in his calves. Josh was wearing shorts, so his calves were exposed. Of course, Matt saw that, so he concentrated on his calves and ordered Josh’s calves to increase by a few inches.

“Oh… Hey! What’s going on?” Josh gasped, as he looked down and noticed his calves were growing.

His calves hardened and continued to inflate. They vibrated a little, before they bulged out until they almost forced against each other, forcing Josh to spread his legs apart a little further.

“There we go. A little more muscle in the legs won’t hurt ya!” Matt laughed.

“You’re always playing with my muscles, huh?” Josh laughed back, as he looked down and examined his bigger calves.

“Of course! I can grow ‘em as big as I want to!” Matt replied. “And you know how much I love growing your muscles, every chance I get!”

“So, what are we gonna do now?” Josh asked him shyly.

“You’re taking us to the fair! Since the fair is a few miles away from here, I need to add some power to your legs. Umm… I’m just gonna make them bigger. So, here goes!” Matt said.

Suddenly, Josh felt an intense tingling in both of his legs.

“Whoa! What are you doing?”

“I’m just gonna make you legs grow big! Just stand still and enjoy the ride!” Matt responded calmly. “I’m in complete control, dude, so don’t worry!”

Josh’s legs rapidly grew longer and thicker. His bone structure changed, as his legs grew much, much bigger than before, making him stand much taller. His calves grew longer and harder in the process, and his feet grew bigger as well. Within minutes, Josh’s legs were over eight feet long, and his quads were over three feet wide.

“Oh man! My legs are huge!” Josh gasped as he looked down.

Indeed, his legs were very long and very thick and wide. His quads were super-thick and covered with amazing veins.

“Now, let me get on your shoulders. Then, start running towards the fair, big guy!” Matt ordered.

Right away, Josh was compelled to allow Matt to sit on his shoulders. Once Matt was all settled in, Josh started running towards the fairgrounds. Running was a snap, with his huge, eight-foot-long legs. His huge muscles made it so he could run fast without getting tired at all. His stride was long and smooth, and he was almost gliding over the street.

Within minutes, Josh and Matt arrived at the fairgrounds. Josh then bent down so that Matt could get back on the ground. As soon as Matt was standing back on his feet again, he wished for Josh to return back to normal.

“There you go, big guy!” Matt chuckled, as he watched Josh’s long legs shrink back to normal, thanks to his awesome powers.

Right away, Josh’s super-long legs started to dwindle. His huge legs shortened and his veins disappeared. His calves deflated and his big quads flattened out. Then his legs shortened in length until Josh was now his old self again.

“Whoa! That was just amazing!” Josh gasped, as he stared at Matt in amazement.

“That was fun, huh?” Matt grinned.

“Yeah! I just love the feeling of my body shrinking and growing all the time!” Josh replied.

“Well, just remember… You get to grow back again when it’s time for us to go back home!” Matt explained. “Then, I’ll need to make you grow again!”

“Well, let’s get into the fair and have some fun!” Josh suggested.

Matt and Josh then turned and walked towards the entrance of the fairgrounds, hoping to get tickets to get into the fair so they could enjoy the rest of the day of fun and games.
1542211221121.title: They go home where Matt grows Josh again

choices: Matt grows Josh on some rides
Matt and Josh go to the Hall of Mirrors
15422112211211.content:
They came up to the ticket booths, and Matt pulled out some cash. "Two tickets, please," he said as he handed it to the surly twenty-two year-old man working the booth.

"What are you doing, Matt?" Josh asked, reaching for his wallet. "I've can pay for--"

"Hey, don't worry about it," Matt said. "You're gonna make up for it in just a bit." A sly grin crossed Matt's face.

"Oh great," Josh said, rolling his eyes. "Whatever you do, just keep it quiet."

"No promises," Matt said.

"Hey, Lover Boys," the booth worker yelled, "Take your tickets and get goin'! You're holding up the line!"

Matt scowled at him, then shook it off, grabbed the tickets, and moved towards the entrance.

As the two boys walked into the fair, they saw all sorts of things they wanted to see, and Matt noticed where he wanted to go to first.

"Look, it's a Guess-Your-Weight booth! We have to go there!" He grabbed Josh's arm and dragged him over.

"Step right up, and I'll guess your weight!" barked the brightly-dressed older gentleman standing by a six-foot-tall scale. "If I'm off by more than ten pounds, you win!"

"My friend Josh wants to play!" Matt chimed in. Josh sighed, shaking his head.

The barker looked Josh up and down with a discerning eye, scrunching his nose and furrowing his brow. After a few seconds, he smiled and said, "Okay, that'll be two dollars."

Matt gladly handed the money over to the man. "Alright, son, I'm gonna guess that you weigh about a buck fifteen. Step up on the scale."

Josh braced himself as he put one foot on the scale, then the other. As he climbed on, he could feel the tingling feeling surge through his body. He looked over at Matt, who had his eyes closed hard in concentration. Suddenly, Josh felt his pecs begin to inflate, pressing outward and tightening his previously-loose shirt. His abs began to grow, and he could feel his biceps and triceps getting thicker. His thigh muscles and calves inflated outward ever so slightly, and he could feel his legs and torso stretch by a few inches.

The whole experience only lasted for a few seconds, but when it was over, Josh had transformed from a skinny freshman nobody into someone who could pass for an athletic junior or senior. His shirt was stretched over his chest, barely coming down to the top of his shorts, which were tight and only came halfway down his now-bulging thighs. It wasn't as big of a change as he had expected, but, as he looked at the scale readout, which read "158" it clearly was enough.

The barker whistled, then rubbed his eyes as he took a second look at Josh. "Land's sake, boy, I've been doin' this game for forty years now, and I've never been this far off before. I guess I'm gettin' too old for this." He rubbed his glasses with his shirt and handed Josh his prize: an over-sized cowboy hat, over a foot tall with a brim at least three feet wide.

As he and Matt walked away, Josh stuffed the hat on his friend. "I'm surprised, Matt," he said. "That was relatively restrained for you."

"Well," Matt said, "I didn't want to give the old guy a heart attack. Besides," he said, smirking, "we're just getting started!"
15422112211211.title: Matt makes Josh grow at the fair

choices: More kids watch Matt's show as he changes Josh.
More kids come to play Simon Says with Josh and Matt
154221122112112.content:
Matt and Josh went into the Hall of Mirrors. Inside, the walked along a narrow hall, which had various mirrors hanging from the walls on both sides. These mirrors had the people's reflections show in various shapes in sizes, including skinny, tall, fat, round, and many other combinations. These mirrors were covering the walls from the floor to the ceiling, so the reflections were astonishing. These gave Matt some ideas.

After they came out of the Hall of Mirrors, Matt saw a few kids coming out of the same attraction, behind him.

"Hey, guys, you want too see something cool?" Matt said to the three kids, which included two boys and two girls.

"Sure!" they all cheered.

"Well, I got the power to change my friend Josh, over here, any way you like, just as in the Hall of Mirrors. So, we're going to play 'Simon Says' right now. So, what do you want to see me do to Josh, first?" Matt asked them.

"Simon says, make Josh taller!" one boy shouted.

Suddenly, Josh started to grow six inches taller. His torso and legs increased in length until it stopped, stretching his body out like a rubber band.

"Oooh wow!" the kids cheered. More kids joined the group and a crowd started forming around Josh and Matt.

"Alright, who's next?" Matt shouted.
154221122112112.title: Matt and Josh go to the Hall of Mirrors

choices: The boy blows more air into the magic balloon.
The boy deflates the balloon for now.
15422112211212.content:
There was a man standing near the entrance to the fair, selling balloons. Matt walked up to him and bought a balloon for a quarter. He realized that he could direct his powers to make inanimate objects affect Josh's muscle growth as well, so he cast a spell on the balloon to make Josh's muscles grow whenever it got inflated with air.

Just then, a little boy walked by, and Matt handed the empty balloon to him.

"Hey kid, have a balloon!" he said, as he handed the boy the balloon.

The kid stared at the empty balloon, and he immediately placed the spout between his lips and he exhaled some air into the balloon, inflating it slightly.

FFOOOOOFFF!

"Whooaa!" Josh gasped, as all his muscles inflated at exactly the same time as the balloon. His biceps inflated, as well as his pecs, and his calves.

"See?" Matt explained. "You made Josh's muscles grow!"

"Oh, cool!" the boy grinned. "I'll blow some more air into it..."
15422112211212.title: More growth for Josh... thanks to Matt!

choices: Nah, I think I'd rather keep this between us.
You know what? Commanding an army of giants might be cool!
1542212.content:
"Actually..." Josh thought... He stared down at Matt, who, hard to believe, had once been about fifteen pounds heavier than he was.
"Uh... Josh?" Matt mumbled, feeling a little nervous. Josh was eyeing Matt rather strangely, looking down at him with an almost...
Matt began to back away. Josh took a single, ground-shuddering step his way.
"Josh, hey man, it's me!" Matt cried out, his voice shrill. Josh bent in low, his face inches from Matt's. Matt's chest heaved in terror.
Josh slowly reached for Matt, and Matt continued to back away, straight into a tree. His breathing began to slow. He gazed up at his enormous giant of a friend. Josh's huge fingers began to wrap around Matt's body, going under his arms and completely covering his torso. Josh began to lift. Matt's feet left the ground.
Josh lifted Matt up, up into the air, to his face, and opened his mouth.
"What are you gonna do to me???" Matt squeaked.
"I have an idea," Josh said. His voice was loud, and... had it gotten deeper?
Matt gasped as Josh began to squeeze him, slowly, but soon he found it hard to breathe. Then, Josh eased up, relaxing, and Matt did too. But then Josh squeezed again, and again, and again, until he was pumping Matt like a stress ball. Matt was gasping for breath...
But then his entire body began to tingle, to the point where Josh could actually feel Matt shaking and vibrating. Matt groaned. "What's happening to me..."
Josh set him down slowly, on his feet. Matt doubled over, feeling strangely bloated and swollen. Then, his body pulsed, and he slowly began to inflate.
"Josh...! What... what'd you do to me???" he grunted, "I feel like... ahhh!!!"
Matt's shirt tightened up, his jeans, he struggled out of his shoes which were now far too small... his clothes began to tear at the seams as his muscles proceeded to inflate far beyond the norm. He blew up, until he bulged everywhere.
Matt gaped at himself. He was now almost eight feet tall, and massive!
Josh grinned. "Pretty awesome, isn't it?"
"I... wow!!!" Matt gasped flexing. "How did you do that?"
"I don't know..."
"I mean, how did you know that would happen?"
"Just a gut feeling, I guess," Josh shrugged. "I mean, mine get bigger when I lift heavy things. But... I don't know. I just kinda went by instinct."
"Well it's awesome!" Matt shouted. "Dude, what if you did this to some more people???"
"You mean like..."
"NO I've got it," Matt cried out in ecstasy. "What if you gathered a bunch of people who've been picked on, and made them get big like this? And then you made an army of giants, like us!"
"Only I want to be the biggest," Josh said firmly.
"Of course, of course," Matt nodded. "You'll be like... the king. Dude, you could take over! No one could stop you!!!"
Josh nodded, musing.

What does he decide?
1542212.title: Josh has something else in mind.

choices: Josh tries to lift the wrecking ball(s)
Josh shrinks and goes to the plaza
154222.content:
Josh grumbled, "Oh god, Matt, stay back."

Matt stumbled backwards, staring at Josh with awe. Josh started shaking. His arms, which were already humongous, started to expand. His biceps ballooned, and his triceps bulged out of his arm. Josh fell to the ground, his arms still getting bigger.

Soon enough, Josh's arms grow to a massive 40"! He flexed his right bicep and it grew even more.

"A-amazing! Josh, I think you're the strongest teen in the world!" Matt said.

"No duh, Matt." Josh said. "Boy, I wonder what I can lift now?"

Josh thought about the car again. Sure, he could crush it with his hands now, but he doubts that no one will notice him crush a car. Then again, he was so huge now, it looked impossible to not see him. Miraculously, the street was deserted.

"Aha!" Matt exclaimed. "What about the site 3 blocks from here? They're tearing down a building, but it's still halfway demolished. The wrecking crew must be at home now, so let's go there!"

Josh nodded and said, "Sure, Iet's go!"

Josh put a massive hand on Matt, and Matt yelled in pain.

"Oh god, sorry Matt! I don't know my own strength." Josh said, dropping Matt.

"Mm..I'll just climb onto you myself..." Matt said, his mind overflowing with thoughts.

Matt stood up and climbed onto the behemoth. He climbed on Josh's back, which was as hard as daimond, and felt like concrete. Josh then lifted his arms, slammed them on the ground, and jumped into the air. The ground where his palms hit cracked and looked like a 5 Ton weight dropped on it and smashed into the Earth.

In less than half a minute, they arrived. Thank god no one was there. Matt slid off the bumpy, muscular back, and slided to the floor. Josh wringed his hands and looked around.

Josh saw a bulldozer, a wrecking ball that was detached, the half demolished building, and another wrecking ball.

"Hm..what now?" Josh said.
154222.title: Josh's arms get  bigger

choices: His arms grow even BIGGER!
Something else happens to Josh...
1542221.content:
“I’m gonna put my big arms to good use!” Josh smiled, as he strolled towards the wrecking ball.

“Uh oh…” Matt sighed, as he looked on at his super-muscular friend. “What are you going to do?”

“I’m gonna finish the job of that demolition crew…” Josh laughed, as he bent down. He used his giant hands to grab hold of the bottom part of the large wrecking ball.

“Urrrrrgggmmmmm” Josh grunted, as he lifted the wrecking ball, using his mighty arms! Then, he turned around, and slowly hoisted the ball above his head.

“Heave… HO!” Josh shouted, as he hurled the wrecking ball straight at the half-demolished building!

CRASH!!!!!!

The ball smashed into the remaining walls with a loud crash, causing the entire structure to crumble upon impact! Within seconds, the entire building came tumbling down and everything was reduced to a mountain of dust and rubble!

“Whoooiieeee!!” Josh cheered, raising his mighty arms into the air! “That was… That was…. Uh oh…”

“What? What’s wrong?” Matt wondered, as he walked over to his best friend.

Josh quickly allowed his huge arms to crash on to the ground with a mighty CRASH, causing the earth to shake and the pavement to tear.

“Uhhhhhh…. I feel it…. Uuuuhhhhh….. Growth spurt!!!! Uhhhmmmnnnn!!!!” Josh moaned, as he made fists with his giant hands, making his huge biceps bulge.

His massive 44 inch arms started to GROW even MORE!! His arms grew even longer, quickly becoming far bigger than the rest of his body, making him almost resemble a gorilla without all the hair! His biceps just bulged as they continued to inflate rapidly! His hands also grew, and there was no stopping in sight!

“Uhhhhh!!!” Josh groaned, as Matt looked on.

It seemed as if Josh’s arms just continued to increase in size and muscle at the same time, making his body appear completely out of proportion! When the growth finally stopped, his arms were five feet thick and forty feet long. Josh’s giant hands were over 6 feet wide! His finger were over 6 feet long!

“Wow…” Josh said, as he moved his giant arms.

Suddenly Matt saw a giant hand come towards him. He was suddenly trapped, held between four giant fingers and one giant thumb!

“Hey! What the…?” Matt gasped, as the giant hand lifted him off the ground. Then he realized he was standing right in front of Josh.

“Ha ha! I’m holding you in my giant hand!” Josh laughed.

“Dude! Your arms… They’re gigantic!” Matt exclaimed.

“Yup! They grew after I lifted that wrecking ball! I destroyed the building!” Josh cheered.

“How are you gonna get around with these giant arms?” Matt wondered.

“I’ll have to hold my arms in front of me while I walk…”

Josh had to use his arms to keep from falling over, but it took some getting used to. It looked strange, seeing a teen walking down the street, with gigantic arms and hands attached to his normal-sized body.

“I’m gonna have to wait for my arms to shrink back, or for them to grow even bigger, or for the rest of me to grow…” Josh reasoned.

What would happen next?
1542221.title: Josh destroys a building, his arms grow even more!

choices: Josh goes back to his room and grows even bigger.
Josh goes to his room and shrinks back.
Josh goes to his room, and he remains muscular.
155.content:
Josh walked into the garage and pressed the button to open the sliding garage door. As soon as the garage door was open, he grabbed the large trashcan by the handle and began to tilt it on its side so that he could wheel it out to the curb of the street.

"Uhh... This thing is so full!" he groaned, as he had to muster every ounce of strength he could come up with, in order to push the large garbage can outside. "Darn, it's heavy! Luckily this thing has wheels!"

Josh gave that trash can one mighty push to get it up the steep driveway and out of the garage. Unfortunately, all that effort had triggered another muscle growth spurt!

"Uhhh..." Josh groaned, when he suddenly felt that weird tingling in his arms and in his legs again. "Arrrrr.... Here we go again!"

Josh had to set the trash can down, because his muscles had gotten too stiff. Then, without warning, his arms thickened, his biceps ballooned, his chest pushed out, and mighty abs popped up on his torso. His legs grew twice as wide as before as his quads inflated dramatically, while his calves ballooned out of the back of his legs. Josh hulked out in a matter of just ten seconds, before it all stopped, leaving him standing there, like a teenage bodybuilder!

"Whoa... I'm big again!" Josh gasped, looking over his thick, muscular arms.

This time, pushing the trash can was a snap. It seemed as light as a feather to Josh! He pushed it to the curb of the street with one hand, before he walked back into the garage. He pressed the button and waited for the garage door to close.

What was Josh going to do next?
155.title: Josh goes outside and grows again

choices: Decided to go to sleep on his broken bed.
Decided to get something to eat.
Was surprised when someone appeared suddenly.
1553.content:
Josh admired his muscles and then decided to go back to his room. Barely fitting through the door, Josh shoved his muscles through, shredding the sides of the doorframe as he did so.

Josh fell on his bed and heard a crunching noise as the bed literally fell apart. He would have been annoyed, but the power was so fun and so...addictive. He couldn't wait for the next spurt to begin. But how could he make it happen again?

"Oh well, I'll just wait a little while and this will happen. Again!" Josh said to himself. Yawning, Josh felt somewhat tired. However...he then felt hungry. Was this all because of the growth?

Patting his stomach, he flexed his biceps. His biceps grew immensely and he watched them grow to insane heights. Flexing his triceps, they also expanded enormously. Josh then ran his hands down his ridged abdominals, and felt so happy he could hardly contain himself.

Then his stomach grumbled again.

So he:
1553.title: Josh goes to his room, and he remains muscular.

choices: Josh's muscles blow up
Josh becomes REALLY BIG!
15533.content:
Josh closed his eyes as he lay on his bed, thinking about all the weird events of the day. he still couldn't believe how his life has changed so much already, and how muscular he had become, when he heard a voice calling out his name.

"Josh! Oh, Josh! Are you awake?"

"Oh... Hmmm... Huh?" Josh groaned, as he slowly opened his eyes.

"Yes, you're my hero!"

Josh opened his eyes and saw a young boy in a space suit standing before him, by the side of his bed. The boy was wearing a brown jumpsuit and he had short, blond hair and bright, blue eyes.

"Huh? Oh! You! You're the alien!"

"Yes! So, do you like your muscles?" the little boy asked him.

"Uhh... Oh, sure! I mean... I love them! Thank you so much!" Josh replied.

"Good!" the boy grinned. "We're going to give you some more. Then, we'll shrink you back to normal so we can start the process all over again! Then we'll repeat it over and over again..."

"Oh wow..." Josh answered.

"Don't worry... We like watching you grow... It's a lot of fun! Just be prepared to become really, REALLY huge! Occasionally, we'll blow up your muscles, okay?"

"Blow up?"

"Yeah! You'll grow so big and fast, you'll feel like your muscles are about to explode! But, don't worry, we fixed your body so you will never get hurt!"

"Oh, what a relief!" Josh sighed.

"Well, I must go! Enjoy your growing muscles! Bye! Thanks for saving my life!" the alien said, before disappearing into thin air.

"Wow..." Josh said, as he sat up on the edge of his bed, wondering what was going to happen next...
15533.title: Was surprised when someone appeared suddenly.

info.brief_description: Josh is 15 yrs old. He starts having random muscle growth spurts after he helps an alien.
info.description:
Josh is just starting high school. As a Freshman, he is the smallest and one of the shortest guys in school; therefore, he gets bullied often.

One day, after school, he walks across a secluded park and he comes upon an alien, who is trapped under a tree branch. The alien being is only a foot tall. Josh reaches down and removes the branch, which had trapped the alien being for several hours.

As his reward, the alien casts a spell on the boy, which makes experience random growth spurts, which make him grow from his 5ft4" 160 pound frame, to a bodybuilder who is 7 feet tall and has 500 pounds of massive muscle, along with fantastic physical super strength!

Not only that; but every time Josh becomes big and muscular, he becomes bigger than the last time, when his muscles grew!

Josh never knows when he has his growth spurt, but he normally stays huge for about an hour. He figures out that drinking milk or eating chocolate causes the growth spurts to occur sooner, giving him a little control over when he grows.

Josh can shrink and grow several times per day!

There is NO LIMIT to how big and how massive Josh can grow. He may become infinitely muscular and strong, there is no limit to his size, height and strength.

The only thing I ask is that I can't STAND stories about muscular bullies and Josh is NO bully. He is a VERY NICE GUY. In fact, he's supposed to be a bit on the timid side. He's very shy and a little bit geeky, so growing huge and muscular may seem a bit scary to him. That's where his best friend Matt comes in!

Even though Josh is a little scared and insecure, he needs Matt to keep his head straight. Josh is fiercely loyal towards Matt, and he will do anything Matt tells him to. Matt is his best friend and Josh will never hurt him. In fact, Matt will help Josh to find ways to make him grow even bigger all the time!

Eventually, Matt may receive the ability to control Josh's muscle growth from the alien! Matt is the ONLY person who can make Josh's muscles grows and he can't make anyone else grow but Josh alone. There is NO LIMIT to how big Josh can become, or how huge his muscles can grow, either!

What happens, next time Josh gets bullies in school, and starts to hulk out, into a teenage bodybuilder?

Please add! Have fun!

***UPDATE****

1) Adding new characters is allowed, as long as they're friends or relatives of Josh.
2) It is allowed to grant Josh the ability to grow other peoples' muscles as well.
3) Extra GP's for good additions of over 100 words in length which follow the story arc and have very few errors in spelling and grammar!!!!
